1.content:
It had been a tiring couple of weeks, as your family had moved recently, the good thing was that you didn't have to get used to a completely new lifestyle, because your family had always lived in the countryside, and you moved to another one, although it was sad that you had to move away from your friends. School had just ended a couple of days before you had moved in. You had started exploring a forest on your family's new property, when you happened to see a hidden door blended almost perfectly into a huge tree stump to which it was attached to, and would be easy to miss. You went to the door and opened it, expecting it to be some kind of club house, it was pretty dark inside of it, so you went to get a flashlight, then came back to the stump and turned the flashlight on. You saw a set of stairs leading down, so you went down them to see what was at the bottom. When you entered though, you noticed a brief glow, which surrounded you. When you got to the bottom, you found a light switch, which you then turned on. A bunch of lights turned on, and you saw that you were in some kind of warehouse.

"Woah..." You said in shock. You looked around and saw a note. "What's this?" You wondered, then began to read it, finding out about the wherehouse. "Wow..." Was all you could say.

What isle do you look at first?

113332222222211.content:
Of course he was going to pick the adult version of the suit, he had something particular in mind after all. (http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/172...)

No, it wasn't for the perverted thrill of having the voluptuous body of the fifth Hokage all to himself, her ample bosom would only play a small part in the role. He was more interested in having a little revenge on someone who had really rubbed him the wrong way.

His thoughts briefly returned to a fight he had just a few days ago with his older sister...

~

"ARGH!" Anthony shrieked at finding the charred remains of his favorite manga books shoved in at the top of the garbage can.

Sarah, his obnoxious seventeen year old sister walked into the kitchen where Anthony stood horrified at the sight of his precious treasures completely destroyed. Even though she was blasted her pink iPod at maximum volume she still yelled at him.

"Keep it down before I tell mom Anthony!"

"I don't care!" Anthony yelled back. "Where is mom!?"

"What?" She couldn't hear him over her headphones.

"Where! Is! Mom!" He mouthed to her.

"I don't know, out or something. Why?"

Anthony grabbed a handful of the black scarps of paper and held it up in front of her.

Sarah just rolled her eyes. "Oh, don't tell me you're crying over me burning that stuff are you?"

"You did WHAT!?"

"You heard me, Charlie was coming over and I didn't want him to get the wrong impression about me. So I had to get rid of those books."

Charlie was Sarah's new boyfriend. He was a like-able enough guy, much different and more fair than Sarah. However, he was also one of the top students in their high school, was captain of the basketball team, and probably would be the valedictorian for graduation this year with the Seniors. In other words, he was a keeper in the eyes of Sarah and she would do anything at all possible to impress him.

The remains of his books flaked through the cracks of his fingers. Probably over two hundred dollars worth of good manga gone in an instant.

"Couldn't you have just moved them!? Or even told me to move them!?

"Oh, lighten up. They're just books. They're pretty cheap."

"No they aren't! You better pay me back for each and every one of them or I'll tell mom!"

"Fine, tell her. And I'll let her know who the one was that dented the car."

Anthony could only growl threateningly. That dent was also Sarah's fault, but she'd probably find someway to plead with their father to place the blame entirely on him. He just slumped his shoulders in defeat.

"Later, brat." She sneered, getting the last word.

~

Anthony normally wasn't the violent type, but in one fell swoop Sarah had obliterated almost his entire manga collection. A collection that he had spent hours working for and months saving his allowance for. This was just too personal and too painful to ignore, he wanted to get revenge on Sarah in the worst way. But if he tried anything funny, she'd no doubt go crying to their parents and he'd end up in even bigger trouble.

However, if he got revenge on her pretending to be someone else...

Anthony took the adult Tsunade suit off the rack and ran his fingers along the surface trying to find the zipper. You see, Sarah was absolutely crazy for her new boyfriend Charlie. So crazy in fact that she dyed her hair blond and stuffed her bras just because she heard a rumor that those were the 'aspects' of a girl Charlie went for. She'd also brutally make fun of any girl that Charlie looked at differently just so they got the hint that they were not to go anywhere near him. Anthony didn't know if Charlie noticed these things or not, but what he did know was Charlie had a terrible reputation of never staying too long with one girl before moving onto the next. In fact, Sarah had to be his seventh girlfriend this semester alone.

With that, the odds were in his favor.

Anthony's plan was simple, as he went over it in his head while he began stripping his clothes. Using the powers of the Tsunade suit, he'd start hanging around the places Sarah usually hung out with Charlie while pretending to be sick so he wouldn't be missed. Heck, he could probably even ask Mia to help him out, her opinions on their big sister weren't too varied. While as Tsunade, he would start to move in closer to Charlie and begin openly flirting with him. With Tsunade's body and a flirty personally to the mix, it was doubtful that Charlie would be able to resist.

Even if Charlie didn't fall for him, he'd give Sarah such a headache that eventually he could consider himself even with her. And if Charlie did fall for him, Anthony would just make sure he forgot all about Sarah and then just dump him. 'Tsunade' would disappear and everyone would forget the whole thing ever happened. Everyone except Sarah, of course.

Anthony let out an evil chuckle as he stepped inside the suit, the material was a strange mix of elastic and softness. Almost like it really was just some really stretchy skin and it really did look like a deflated Tsunade. It took a few minutes of fiddling around, but eventually he wiggled his toes into their proper place of the suit. It didn't take much more effort to fit both of his feet entirely in.

That was when he began to wonder how the suit was going to work. After all, he was a tall guy being over six feet and Tsunade was about 5'2. This might be trouble as the more her worked the suit up his body, the tighter and harder to put on it became. It was when the suit was up to his waist that he had to take a moment to rest.

"Come on...Just the arms and the mask..." He muttered to himself.

Putting the arms on was like trying to run forward with a giant rubber band tied to you and a pole behind you. Everything was skintight and uncomfortable but after a few grunts and hard pulls he succeeded in getting the suit on up to his neck. All that remained was the mask.

Grabbing two fistfuls of the blond hair, Anthony pulled with all his might the mask over her head. It took just a few seconds to align the eye sockets with his own eyes, but at last everything was all set. Except none of the changes were occurring.

"I guess I got to zip it up for it to work..."

He reached around the back for the metal zipper at the base of his spine. It was like magic, the moment he grabbed it and pulled up was the moment his world began to change. Everything got larger as he started to shrink in height. His big arms and legs that filled the suit slowly began to thin out, his fingers and toes became more dainty and female-like.

All the fat that had been spread over his body was condensing itself to key points on his new changing form. His thighs and legs ballooned out, but the biggest growth was in the form of his chest which slowly expanding out to the size of two large melons.

Anthony could feel his face reshaping itself, making subtle changes in bone structure to perfectly match Tsunade's. There was also a dryness in his throat which he assumed was his vocal chords shifting to give him a young woman's voice. He closed his eyes as he felt a twisting in his crotch area which were the changes in his reproductive system to match that of a fully functional female one.

Then everything set in place. There was no longer a boy named Anthony standing in the warehouse, but a beautiful young woman who was looking at a nearby mirroring admiring herself.

So the note was true and the first test run was complete. Anthony thought the next best thing to do was...

115221.content:
There was much to dislike about Akane in your mind. She was at times inconsiderate and thick as a brick. Granted, some of her violent outbursts were justified by Ranma's stubbornness, but she just rubbed you the wrong way.

So it was to your surprise, you were drawn to the Akane suit over the other girls from the show. She wasn't the prettiest, nor was she the cutest. Perhaps it's her strength, or her rarely seen soft side. May be as a character you found her a bit humorous.

"So why do I want to be her?" you say to yourself. 'May be I don't care if I mess around with her life, when I visit the Ranma universe,' you surmised. It sounded reasonable enough to you, but you suspected something more subconscious. You turned your attention to the suit.

Despite what Ranma said, Akane possessed moderately sized assets. The deflated suit hinted of female curves, but the overall shape suggested well-toned muscles, and a slightly masculine physique. No wonder Akane was sensitive about her femininity. Yet even without her naughty parts, she definitely looked feminine.

Looking to the side you see an identical Akane suit, but with long-hair. Turning your attention back to the short-haired one, you admitted short suited her best.

"I must be crazy. Of all the suits, she has to be the first I wear..." you shrugged as you quickly deposited all you clothes on a vacant shelf.

The synthetic flesh felt cold to the touch, but so lifelike in texture. You turned the suit over to the back, noting the entrance that ran from the base of the neck to the buttocks. Your feet slip in with little effort.

Wiggling your toes, you marvel at how the smaller girl's frame stretched over your's. Bringing the hips into place, you slipped your manhood into an internal sheath connected to Akane's womanhood. 'at least I can go to the bathroom in this thing,' you thought with some relief, as getting out of this suit you figure would take some effort. You continue on.

Then came the arms, and with your newly encased arms you pushed her mounds into your bare chest, savoring the moment as they clung to you to become your new front. All the while you noticed you were shrinking a tiny bit with each tug and pull.

Finally came the Akane's head as you dove yours face into the sagging neck hole. After some minor struggle, you aligned the eyeholes, mouth, nostrils, and ears as best you can. Then pinching close the seam in the back a sudden pressure overtakes you. It was not painful, but certainly uncomfortable. A pleasantly hot sensation erupts throughout your body, and as it subsides you feel the slight coolness of the warehouse, and suddenly felt naked again.

You are now several heads shorter now. Approaching a mirror a few yards away, you feel the coolness of the concrete on your new feet as you walk. Gazing at the reflection in awe was Akane, who mirrored your every expression.

"I need clothes," you said in the tomboy's voice. You expected a change in voice, but confirmation of this change left Akane's face with a pleasantly surprised look. A rather cute expression.

First came the panties. Then tapping into Akane's knowledge allowed you to attach the bra with no difficulty. There were many clothes, but you decided on the classic Furinkan High school uniform, the autumn one with long white sleeves, and an apron like blue-ish top and matching long skirt with a bow at the back.

Walking back to the mirror, you struck several Akane-like poses. Your favorite was an expression of pure rage, but that ridiculous over-the-top look all dissolved in a hearty fit of girlish laughter.

"Boy Akane can be cute if she laughed some more," you noted with a chuckle. Exploring Akane's persona you noted her obvious insecurities and aspirations. Like all people she had her flaws, staring into her soul confirmed what you've known all along. She desperately loves Ranma.

"Let's see what's in store," as you secured yourself in the dimensional transport machine and set the destination. It would take you to Ranma's world midway through the series. Brightness filled the interior, and consumed you. For a moment you saw streams plasma and streaky bits of matter that danced around you as everything descended into darkness. You opened your eyes...

1152212221.content:
You open your eyes to a clear early autumn sky. The serene blue disturbed only by the airborne body of Ranma as it sailed to the apex before vanishing in a twinkle. Within seconds you take note of your new body and its surroundings.

"Huff...huff...huff...huff..." you're trying hard to catch your breath. It must have taken a great deal of your energy to propel him that far. That and your body is obviously PO'ed and tense.

You feel the weight of a heavy mallet in your small hands. Surprisingly it was really easy hold, no doubt due to your new brute strength. Akane could be good home run hitter if she only had the hand-eye coordination, or even cared about baseball. Dropping the mallet, you let it fade off into hammer-space.

Taking note of your tense body you begin to relax the muscles. The gnashing of your teeth stopped once you realize you were grinding involuntarily. Annoyed narrowed eyes opened wider into a more neutral expression. Your taunt face soften somewhat. Closing your eyes and taking a deep breath, you opened them once again, now your normal calm self. The process took a few seconds, as you now focused on your environment.

It is an unusually balmy afternoon and you relished the refreshing breeze on your slightly sweaty face, taking care to hold down your skirt so your panties are not exposed. It was not all that hard since the skirt is realistically long, unlike some uniforms in other series. Still it is a strong enough breeze to warrant the act.

'After all..there are some real perverts in this world. I need to protect my...her feminine dignity' you say to yourself. Sure it was not really your body, but you felt Akane deserved at least that muich respect. All the sensations of the artificial skin felt so real, it might as well be your body.

Seeing your leather school bag on the ground you pick it up. Judging by the sun and the bag it was a little after school had ended. May be the two of you were walking home, or may be somewhere else. You are about to search Akane’s memories when you felt a cool chill down your spine. So into the moment you almost failed to detect the strong hostile auras behind you.

"No doubt it's them. Now what to do?" you say knowing full well who 'them' are without looking. The negative energy was there all along, and you feel reluctant to turn around.

"Might as well get this over with," you take one more deep breath, before doing an about face into the glares of Shampoo, Ukyou, Kodachi, and...some other angry girl. 'May be a new character of the day?' you thought. Whatever the case they obviously saw what you did to Ranma and they want your blood.

The tension suddenly subsides as the cool room temperature of the warehouse hits your new body. Feeling beads of sweat on your forehead, you wipe them away before opening your eyes to an exact likeness of Kodachi in the mirror.

Even though you expected such a transformation, nothing could prepare you to be an anime character for the first time. The black haired girl in the mirror copies every surprise and wide eyed look on your face. She... no...You look really cute befuddled.

Snapping back to attention you walk back to the Kodachi section looking for clothes. Forgoing the lacy black lingerie, you put on a one piece green leotard with black trim. Normally you hate tight fitting clothes let alone spandex, but the feeling of it on your new skin now feels just right as you stretched it over your nude body. You turn your attention to the outer clothing you would wear. Kodachi’s wardrobe is extensive, including some you never seen in the series, but you’re partial to two outfits. There was her beautiful black kimono and her school uniform. After some debate you on impulse picked the school uniform. After all you can change clothes in the Ranma-verse later if you feel like it.

The St. Hebereke School for Girls uniform is a classic sailor fuku design. You note the long green-brown skirt that extends down to the knees as you slip it on. Then you don the white blouse top with short sleeves and a matching green-brown sailor collar. It involved traveling through Routes 1-4 as well as through Aquacorde Town, Santalune Forest, and then Santalune City. That was a long ride. Thank good for bikes, a thought that made you smile.

Well, since your destination was decided, you were riding again, seeing a flock of Fletching fly above you. The wide plains and mountains lined the distance, filling your face with awe. Despite how animated the world was (and it certainly did), there was this odd sense of realism, like it didn't feel fake at all. To be honest, this was a world you could get used to. Actually, that last thought brought a small blush to your cheeks. Part of what made Serena popular was the obvious shipping with Ash. You didn't have a Pokemon or any Pokeballs for that matter, so it was a moot point. Putting that aside, you just continued on your way.

Eventually, you stopped in Aquacode Town for some lunch, as you apparently had a good amount of money in your backpack. You certainly hoped that you could get some money like in the games, because you would need it. After you had a nice sandwich and drink to get yourself going again, you were off, heading into the Santalune Forest. You hadn't seen many forests back in your world, so seeing a Pokemon version had a very unique feel to it. Like in the game, you actually saw a Pikachu or two hopping around, but you still had nothing to catch one. You made a mental note to come back here for one.

You actually met some people along the way, especially some trainers who wanted to show off some new Pokemon they caught. You didn't know the feeling yet, but you tried to be happy for them, explaining that you were on your way to getting your own Pokemon. That night, you slept comfortably in your pajamas, lightly laughing to yourself at how you somehow fit your pajamas, some clothes, and even folding up your bike to put in the backpack.

You had to wonder if Serena's body was just made for sleeping or something, because you woke up later than you normally do. Still, with a day's worth of experience, getting ready was no problem and you were able to get a nice breakfast. After thanking Nurse Joy for the hospitality, you got the bike out again and were off. Route 4 was a straight shot to Lumiose City, but you saw the city for miles before you arrived, seeing the grand tower in the center of the city. You had never been to France in your world, so seeing the tower was truly amazing. However, sightseeing would have to wait. In the anime, Ash arrived by airplane, so you needed to find it. Luckily, as you entered the gate into Lumiose, there were maps everywhere, including to the airport. Seeing where it was, you mounted the bike again and were off. "Hello Kalos region! Ash Ketchum is finally here!!"

“All of the girls you chose were… human.”

“All the suits are humanoids though.” You countered.

“If you looked harder, there are quite a few suits that are a lot different than a normal girl.” Brianna gestured to herself and then to you. “Ruto is a little different, and I’m a mermaid, not a human. There were a lot of monster girl costumes. Giants too. One costume was large enough to cover a truck.”

“So you’re saying you want us to swap into a monster girl.” You stared at her skeptically.

“Would be a lot more interesting seeing how reality changed if we were more than humans,” Brianna pointed out. “What if I chose Diane from the Seven Deadly Sins? She’s a giant. Would my house change? Would I live somewhere else? Think about it.”

You did.

From what happened when you wore previous suits, your room changed to something more girly and the color schemes changed. Your belongings also shifted to fit the girl’s interest. What would happen if you were a giant? Or a snake-girl? How much would things change? How would your family act after considering you were normal.

Do you want to do it?

Brianna grinned at your reply.

“Knew you just needed someone to light the fire in you,” she told you and jumped out of the water to land on you and gave a big hug. “You always are up for having fun.”

“Love you too, Bri.” You returned the hug. “Let me get to the shore first and get your chair.”

“Yeah,” Brianna agreed. “I probably wouldn’t be able to get out myself.” She gestured to your tail.

After some struggling to get her back in the seat and then getting the chair out of the shallows, seriously it was tough, you finally started the way back. You were going slower, a little tired from all the swimming. It also might have been that Ruto wasn’t as agile on land as in the water. Those large fins kind of got in your way. As you two turned to small talk, Brianna turned the subject to something more serious.

“Did James seem down to you today?”

“Er…” You weren’t sure how to answer it. You knew why, but James didn’t want you to tell.

“You do know!” Brianna accused and turned around to glare at you. “Spill it.”

“Arg… fine.” It didn’t take long to explain what happened.

“That…asshole!” Brianna cried out. “We should go and kick his butt.”

“I thought about it,” You told her seriously. “If we do that, it’s only going to get us into trouble with the law. I’ve been thinking how to get revenge and have an idea what to do. Though, I rather James take the initiative and get his game back by himself. He needs to stand up for himself.”

“I guess I understand that.” Brianna went quiet for a moment. “Once you do get revenge on Kevin, can I help?”

“Sure. I may need a second pair of hands.” She rubbed her hands together in anticipation and, as the bunker came into view, you decided to change the topic. “So, what are we changing into?”

“I think we should be characters in the same show,” Brianna said instantly. “Just to match.”

“That’s one idea.” You nodded but also thought about different options.

11533222222211.content:
Looking through the vast amounts of choices he had scattered about in probably every direction, Anthony really wasn't sure on what to pick. Being an avid fan of anime and manga in general, many of the grotesque skins appealed to him in all kinds of ways. He could be that character from that anime, or that character, or that... It was like he never would leave. A single glance told him that if he actually decided to try all of it, he wouldn't. Forcing himself to decide, he took an aisle at complete random, and didn't look before it seemed to stop. As he had covered his eyes with his hand, he looked at the line to his side, jumping slightly in surprise. The existence of suits of the girls from Kämpfer surprised him, but in a good way. If there was a series he liked yet also didn't, it was Kämpfer. It gave him a couple of laughs now and again, and it was at least decent, if not more. Even so, an anime which contained gun-toting schoolgirls and a fire-throwing girl who was actually a guy wasn't something he would recommend to anyone. It was silly in its own way, but that kind of "silly" that just didn't appeal to everyone.

Natsuru was likeable, yet not. Anthony himself really liked and disliked him, probably because the guy's stupidity was amusing, how simple-minded he was really annoyed him at the same time. However, that didn't stop him from actually taking a liking of him, or probably just his female form. A strange form of delight went through Anthony's head when he noticed the blue hair hanging from the wall, a school uniform, among other outfits, neatly stacked on a shelf beside. Hesitantly, he pulled the suit down, but stopped in his tracks, feeling its rubber-like skin between his fingers. It was nearly lifelike, which was scary, but that was probably something he could ignore.

Finding the zipper on the suit's back, he pulled it down, before having said suit fall to the floor, as he began to take his own clothes off. Exactly why he did was something he couldn't point an answer to, it was just that it felt like the best of ideas. Perhaps it was because one usually didn't have clothes on when they put on skintight bodysuits otherwise, really. Standing bare naked, alone in the giant warehouse, he pulled the suit up from the cold floor, and began putting it on. First came his feet, which made the suit's legs bulge out grotesquely, but as it didn't seem to make it fall apart, he continued. Because he didn't have a mirror, he couldn't admire himself, standing around with female skin draped over him, but with his own head sticking out. Was it supposed to be like that? He recalled the zipper, and pulled the head over his own like a fully covering mask. Pulling up the zipper, he felt sudden changes beginning to take hold. After probably only a few seconds, he was Natsuru.

"...W-Whaa!?" He gasped. Even his, or now her, voice had changed! Anthony was shocked at how a rubbery suit could've changed her so much, just like that. Still shocked, she moved her new head around, only to find a mirror on the side of the racks, and went over to it. Yes, that was exactly a naked version of Natsuru standing in front of her. Not exactly thinking it was real, she moved her hand over the new lump of fat on her chest, and squeezed. The sudden feeling through her body told her it really was real. No magician or version of "The Hidden Camera" could perform such a trick. Such a feat was completely impossible!

Staring in disbelief at her new self, she noticed how her reflection shivered heavily. Indeed, she was cold, seeing as she was naked in the warehouse. Recalling clothing, she went back to the shelf where she found the suit, and began putting the school uniform on. Even if it was incredibly breezy being in a skirt, it was still better than being naked. Soon, she began pondering on what to do.

11533222222222111.content:
Which one to pick?

You continue to glance back and forth at the two lifeless husks. They were perfect facsimiles of the characters in every way. The sagging faces, vacant mouths, and empty eyeholes still a gave a hint of the characters' personalities. You chuckle slightly as you notice Mikuru's whimpering expression and Haruhi's small scowl...at least that's how you perceived them to be.

Shy and meek girls...they are appealing....but you are in an excitable mood. For a normally calm person, you could hardly contain yourself. Being an anime character, let alone entering an anime universe was beyond your wildest dreams. You quickly shed your clothes, tossing them in a messy pile on the ground. With so much pent up energy, you want to scream and to run around in your soon to be new body.

Mikuru would not do and neither would Yuki. The idea of an aggressive Mikuru and an excitable Yuki sounded like a good suiting idea for later on, but not now. You liked both characters, but not for your first masking as you wished to stay in character.

"Haruhi it will be," you stated, reaching out for the suit. You pause momentarily as your hands hovered over the Haruhi suit. There's another energetic character. Shifting your eyes down the aisle, they come to rest on the skin of a teenage girl with dark green hair that extended down to her shins.

Tsuruya...how could you have forgotten her? Another one of your favorites. Despite her limited appearances, this minor character was still endearing. Tsuruya exuded the most carefree attitude of the show's girls. She treated everyone pleasantly enough, and wasn't as bossy as the brigade leader. You also wondered for the longest time what her personal name is as Tsuruya is her family name. Still, suiting as Haruhi is appealing enough. While you won't have the real Haruhi's true god-like powers, you were eager to test the suit's limits.

Which one to pick?
11533222222222111.title: Haruhi or Tsuruya?

1153322222222212.content:
Eyeing the suits hanging in a neat fashion, Anthony was feeling some form of... Feeling inside of his chest, which kept him from actually thinking straight. If he was going to be honest, he couldn't decide on anything at all, and his gaze shifted across the row of character from the show. Everyone from the normal ones to the gender-bendered versions of characters was there, which only kept him eyeing them even longer. The problem was, he couldn't decide which one he would pick, either. Of course, he had choices... He could just pick one at sheer random, closing his eyes and pointing at one of them, but he was sure he wouldn't be satisfied with the choice. Sure, he could just pick another suit if the suit didn't satisfy him, but he wanted one he was immediately satisfied with...

Just then, he felt his hand nudge at something hard lying in his pocket. Fishing the item out, he quickly realized it only was his cellphone, although... It was his cellphone. Maybe a friend could help him with choosing? As soon as the thought left his head, he was already pressing the number-keys on his phone to bring out James number. After a few beeps, he answered.

"...Hello, James speaking?"


"Hi, it's Anthony! I know this is incredibly sudden, but I wanted to know: Since you've seen the Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, which girl was your favorite? ...You know, if you had one."

After a long moment of silence, James decided to answer, with a slight tremble to his voice.

"...U-Uuuh, I guess I liked Y-Yuki or M-Mikuru a lot... N-No, it's Mikuru! Yeah."

"Well, thanks for letting me know! Really appreciated!"

Without anyone there to see it, Anthony gave out a smile.

11533222222222121.content:
Anthony quickly removed the suit from the rack, only to put it back again. He would need to undress first. Unbuttoning his dark blue shirt, he looked for a place to store his clothes, deciding on a vacant cubbyhole located next to the skin. Then came the pants followed by his boxers. The warehouse was a little cold but still on the pleasant side as stood the there naked. He almost had second thoughts as his eyes drifted over the other girl suits from the series, but shook it off. If continued he would never suit up. Might as well get it over with.

Without another thought or stray glance he seized the Mikuru suit from behind, removing it from the rack. Noting a seam running from crook of the neck down to the tailbone. Acting on a steady pace he slipped his right leg into the suit, noting the elasticity of the artificial skin, and how it slid down into place without much difficulty. Then came the next leg. As he brought the suit's waist up into place he noted an internal sleeve within the suit to place his manhood. A slight hint of arousal came as it slipped into place. It's only then that he noticed he was a few inches shorter. Looking down he saw the other half of the suit hanging limply, the ends of the suit's long hair touching the concrete floor, he as saw his legs were noticeably thinner and smaller.

Resuming his pace, he slipped one hand into the suit's arm hole, followed by the other, slipping it on was easier than a glove. His arms were a little shorter now, not quite like Mikuru's but definitely more petite. In one motion Anthony took his newly suited hands and stretched the top seam closest to the neck and dove his face in. Pushing upward the walls of mask pushed back. Feeling pressure all around his head he continue, as his mouth connected with Mikuru's. Then his ears popped into place as the muffled sounds with the mask became the crisp ambient sound of the warehouse. Then the nose, surprisingly the suit did not smell of cheap rubber, in fact it smelt like nothing. Finally the eyes lined up, stretching the suits eyelids over his eyes, he instinctively pressed it over his closed eyes. Opening up his eyes he still had the same vision, but using his hands he felt the contours around his eyes noting they were definitely larger. Last part he looked down at his sagging breast, cupping each one in her hands she pushed them into her chest rubbing them, as the mounds warmed up and took a nice natural bounce. Feeling the tailbone Anthony found a fleshy zipper tab, and drew it up to her neck. As soon as the seam closed Anthony's felt a single jolt much like when one got shocked. This was replaced sustained pressure throughout his body. The effect lasted only a moment.

Walking to a nearby full length mirror he looked at his reflection mouth agape. A perfect copy of the traveler, in all her anime pigment hue glory. Anthony noted a slight shadowing that was often present in movies he seen when cartoon characters came to the real world, but it was Mikuru...he was Mikuru. Closing his mouth the character in the mirror did the same, following every single movement. The novelty of each sensation was so pleasing, he knew now that masking as any beautiful anime girl would have been satisfying. Feeling her soft long orangey hair, her slender curves, and that cute star-shaped mole on her left breast.

"My voice should be the same as..." he trailed off, as his new voice was a perfect copy of the dub character's one.

Thinking mentally about speaking Japanese, even though he knew very little, he spoke again and noted he had the Japanese voice of Mikuru. With the Japanese mindset, he decided to speak some English.

"Da quik blown foxsu jumpu ova da razy dog" he said in very broken English.

Having a need to stick to his native tongue he mentally pictured himself talking English, and repeated again, this time noting the dub character's voice returned. He personally preferred subs, but the thought of speaking Japanese so well, and English so badly weirded him out more than having Mikuru's body. Time to dress.

He decided right from the start to go for the North High uniform, as he cared not so much for maids. First some nice panties which slipped on with little trouble. After struggling with the bra, he mentally search Mikuru's head, and decided to put her in partial control as far as dressing went. This was good as he new nothing about getting this sailor suit on. He was in control and not at the same time, it felt like that little voice in back of your head, or instinct that tells you what you should do. It was all controllable as Anthony tightened the light blue belt around the matching blue skirt, followed by pulling over the shirt. Straightening out the collar, he grabbed the ribbon from the shelf and expertly tied it into place. He picked the winter uniform, so his sleeves were covered. Turning around he faced the mirror again and grinned. He only watched a few episodes but could gauge that this expression was not fitting of Mikuru, as he tried a small demure smile, and big worried eyes. It was shocking how well he was able to copy her. Then again having this body helps a great deal. Returning to a more neutral face Anthony gave the mirror a once over. One-hundred percent Mikuru. Now what to do?

1153322222222222222.content:
"Oh...boy..." you say with a sense of mixed apprehension and delight. You nervously glance at another show's section ahead and then back at the one in front of you.

"Should I try this out or go on to another show...? I'll look at another... No! Wait! This one's fine. What's there to be afraid...it's only Cardcaptor Sakura..."

Normally, nothing seems to rattle you in real life, and you often spoke your mind without fear of judgment. It's not that you're an inconsiderate big mouth or a rebel. You respect others' feelings, but hold no reservations voicing your opinion when needed.

"...and it's a good show. Nothing to be ashamed about no matter what the others will say." you reason while approaching a prop shelf. Picking up a partial deck of Clow Cards, you riffle through them absently; your mind in deep though. It was one of the first anime shows you've seen and got you hooked to the anime subculture. Regardless of the bad TV dub, you were originally captivated. Finding the original uncut episodes made you appreciate the joys of this cute series even more. Yes the show was made for kids, but you consider yourself a kid at heart. Regardless of the hackneyed phrase it is true. After all to see the world with child's eyes keeps things interesting.

"Be frank, keep it simple, enjoy life, and let no one bring you down."

Those are words you try to live by every day. Still, it's hard with your bratty older sis egging you daily. Your other siblings are much better, but they too have a way of pestering and embarrassing you at times. Putting the cards back, you continue to pace around this section.

"If they found out I wore CCS character I'll never hear the end of it." You're comfortable enough with your gender and proud to be a man. Still, you have no problems getting in touch with your feminine side. You appreciate the cute and sentimental parts of life. Nothing others could say would make you less of a man because of it, even if you become a cute magic girl...or one her friends.

That still did not ease your mind completely. If only you could wear male suits. You wanted so badly to be Syaoran and test out the boy's swordsmanship. Also, if only you craved a mature, sexy, or bad-ass type of woman character than it was more tolerable, at least to them.

"But no one has to know if I don't tell. Anyways, I control the entrance to the warehouse and can use that as leverage if they do find out. I know they'll like the warehouse, and can deny them access with they annoy me," you chuckle as you realize how worried you were over nothing. Even if they did poke fun of you, it was only in good humor...at least you hope it is. Besides following your heart is important and worth the joking it may produce.

You're ready to pick a suit when a sudden urge to browse wells up. There are other series you like and you never know what new character you might stumble upon. Do you pick now, or continue searching other shows?
1153322222222222222.title: Cardcaptor Sakura

Looking at the suit you feel it's the most obvious choice.

12133221.content:
While searching through the Mario Bros. section, you find a costume of one of your favorite characters from the series, Vivian. You don't really believe these suits can do all the enclosed instruction book said they could, but they are still very well designed, almost lifelike, so you you still want to give them a try on.

You pick up the Vivian suit, as well as its hat and gloves. You put the arms and head around your own, but you have trouble figuring out how your legs are supposed to go into Vivian's... Leg? Tail? What would you call it? Whatever it is, you have trouble putting it on.

"That book said I could control these suits with my mind." You say with a bit of sarcasm. "Maybe I should ask the suit to help me put it on."

As if it was listening, the lower appendage of the suit suddenly wraps around your legs, causing you to tumble over. Then the suit seems painfully tight, shrinking your head and arms. But it's nothing compared to what's happening to your legs. They are pressed together until it feels as if you only have one leg, and you can't even feel the bones in them any more.

You lay there panting for a few minutes before trying to get up again. Your new appendage makes it surprisingly easy. You look yourself over, seeing Vivian's purple, shadowy skin.

"It really worked?" You ask, in an adorable voice. It would seem that it did. Before you panic, though, you remember how that book said that unless you got pregnant, you could get out of the suits at any time. Since the rest of the book seems to be true, you don't need to worry yet.

Now, what set of clothes are you planning to wear?

As you browsed through the Mario section of the suits, you couldn't help but be a little surprised when you encountered a pair of white, rabbit-like suits hanging near the end of the rack. These suits belonged to the Broodals, a new set of villains introduced in the recently released Super Mario Odyssey, or at least the female members of the group. You know how the warehouse worked from the note, but you were still a little amazed that characters who were so new to the Mario series were already in here.

You did rather like the Broodals during your time playing Odyssey, so you decide to try on one of their suits. After a moment of pondering, you decide to try on the Madame Broode suit. While Hariet did look more appealing, Madame Broode was so different from you in every way that it seemed enticing. She wasn't human and was a woman, traits shared with Hariet, but she was also older and... larger. Becoming her seemed like such a completely different experience from your own body that you couldn't help but want to try the suit on. You'd always be able to take it off if you decided you didn't like it, after all.

But how big exactly was the Madame Broode suit? Was it shrunken down to about the height of a normal person? Or was it accurate to its in-game size, towering several times taller than what Mario would have been?
121332222222212.title: Madame Broode

1213322222222122.content:
As you pulled the suit off the rack, it suddenly occurred to you that you had no idea how you were going to put this thing on. Laying it down on the floor, it was so large that you could probably fit inside one of its hands if you tried hard enough. It was accurate to the game, with her towering over Mario, but it made it a bit impractical to wear a suit of her, comparative to the other more human-sized suits lining the racks.

Regardless, you figure it was still worth a try, so you open up the zipper on the back of the suit, strip naked, and step into it. You do your best to get your feet into the feet of the suit, the suit's legs pooling around your ankles. Your feet obviously didn't fit the suit's feet, but you managed to get them into about the right position. Next, you worked on pulling the suit's arms up your own like oversized sleeves. Your fingers obviously didn't reach to the ends Madame Broode's chubby digits, but you fit them into place anyway. You now had the bulk of the suit hanging from you, but thankfully, most of it was pooled on the ground around your legs, so you weren't holding up its full weight with your body. The only part of your body that wasn't in the suit yet was your head. Of course, just like the rest of the suit, the head was ridiculously large compared to you, but you did your best to put it on anyway. You tried to line it up so that you could see through the eye holes, even if that meant the actual top of the head was hanging behind you, and the mouth was hanging down near your chest.

You knew you probably looked ridiculous, but you didn't really have a way of checking, because you certainly wouldn't be walking over to any mirrors with the bulk of the costume pooled around your legs. Instead, you opted to complete the process. You pulled up the costume's back until you could find the end of the zipper, and pulled it up until the suit was closed, a difficult task considering your fingers didn't fit properly into the suit's fingers. The moment the suit was closed, it began to work its magic. To an outsider's perspective, it would look like the suit was being inflated, like a balloon being filled with air. But for you, it was a much more uncomfortable experience. You could feel yourself growing, bones stretching and shifting into place, flesh bulging out of your body to fill the suit's folds. It was all rather unpleasant, but soon enough, it just stopped. The suit had finished its job, and the zipper disappeared from the back until it would be needed again.

You were right about how different everything would feel. Although you could certainly see that you now towered over the other suits in the warehouse, that wasn't really something you could feel. You could, however, feel the rolls of fat falling from your body, the flabby breasts hanging from your chest and the void between your legs, the long, blue curls that hung from your head, the layer of fur that covered your body, the long ears that stood upright atop your head, and the fluffy tail that sat above your backside. You pat down your body with your chubby, four-fingered hands, feeling the soft, jiggly flesh you now possessed. It was a little offputting, having stayed mostly in shape yourself. You considered taking the suit off now, and trying out a different one, but ultimately, you endeavoured to stick it out a little longer, deciding to try and have a little fun with a body so different from your own.

You weren't going to stay naked, though. Although your fur kept you fairly warm in the cold of the warehouse, you didn't really feel comfortable walking around naked, even if it wasn't your own body you were walking around in. You figure that you should go for the obvious choice of clothing, and just put on Madame Broode's clothes, seeing as most of the clothing in the warehouse was made for people much smaller than you currently were. You slide on the oversized bloomers, and are a little surprised to find no sort of bra amongst her clothing. Although in hindsight, with the way they jiggled around in-game, it probably should have been obvious that they had no sort of support. Next, you squeeze into the large red dress, stretching it in several places despite its size. It was uncomfortably tight around your plump body, you decided it was better than simply walking around naked. You finished off my putting on Madame Broode's various accessories; the gold spiked bracelets around your wrists, the pearl necklace around your neck, and the large pink hat atop your head.

Throughout getting dressed, you'd managed to get used to the way Madame Broode's body jiggled with every movement you made. It was still a bit uncomfortable, especially with the dress tight around your body, but it didn't bother you as much. You paced back and forth a bit, getting used to walking around in an unfamiliar body, as you pondered what to do next. You could always go outside for a bit. You were kind of curious how it would feel to have the wind running through your fur. Of course, you were a little worried about having someone spot you, and start freaking out about a giant rabbit monster. Perhaps there'd be a way inside the warehouse to make it normal for you to look like this? And while you're at it, a way to make the door big enough for you to fit through. On the other hand, you could explore the warehouse a bit more. You could see over the racks with your new size, so navigating it should be a bit easier. You were pretty sure the note said something about a machine that should be able to put you into the universe of the character whose suit you were wearing, so that could be fun. Although, Madame Broode was one of the bosses of the game, and you weren't so keen on getting a Chain Chomp to the face, courtesy of Mario.
1213322222222122.title: In-Game Size

122222.content:
You walk toward to the rack containing suits for the two versions of Ruto. One for the child version, and one for the adult version. You take the adult version of Ruto suit off the rack because she's your favorite adult Legend of Zelda character, You see a huge water bottle nearby saying that it is there in case it gets hot enough to start dehydrating you. You take it out with your free hand as you then place both the suit and bottle a bit away from each other before stripping.

You try to wiggle your toes, but a flipper doesn't have any, so your entire front of the flipper just sways back and forth, you also feel scales on your right leg. You put your left leg in, same feeling as from your right leg. You pull the suit up to your lower body, and then began to put your arms into the suit arms, you then notice you have big Zora fins on your arms.

"Wow. Never seen these up close." You muse, examining them. You grab the head of the suit, and you place your own head inside. You make sure that all of the facial features are aligned, and then you seal up the suit, the zipper disappearing in the process. You are now the adult version of Ruto.

What should you do now?
122222.title: Becoming a Zora princess

choices: Get dressed and go fool around with some friends!
Find another suit to try on.
1222311.content:
Malon had always been one of Anthony's favorite characters in any of the Zelda video games. She was carefree, smart, and actually sort of cute. Of course both the Adult and Child Malon suits were available, and both looked way too small for Anthony to fit in. Still, it would be a fun experience to see if the suit actually shrunk him to child size. He grabbed the younger Malon suit off the rack. Being a tall young man, it only came up to his waist in height.

"Well, this will be interesting..." He muttered to himself.

He stripped himself until he stood naked and shivering. The suit had a zipper going down the center of the chest to the suit's privates. But the problem was getting inside of it, Anthony had to stretch the suit like a rubber band just to be able to fit in it. With one foot at the bottom of the zipper and one hand holding the top open, he stepped inside. He released his foot and grabbed the bottom end with his free hand, allowing him to fit both feet inside.

Wiggling around, he was able to fit both feet in their respective spots. He let go of the suit and started to work his hands into it. He had to move through the thin limbs of the suit, but at last, his arms too were in the suit. Then the magic began.

His whole world was growing right before his eyes. The suit was shrinking him to the size of a little girl! Tingles were felt on every inch of his diminishing body. This wasn't the suit shrinking, his actual body was being crushed into the appropriate shape! At last the tingling faded, and he stood over 3 feet tall with his own head on young Malon's body.

"That was awesome! Now let's add the finishing touch!" He said. He pulled the head of the suit over his face and zipped up the zipper as his skull shrank to fit the rest of his body. A naked child Malon stood where Anthony had moments ago.
1222311.title: Down we go as younger Malon.

1222312.content:
Anthony stopped at the Malon section of the aisle and found the two suits; adult and child Malon. Both looked small on him, being as a tall young man. He decided to try the adult Malon first since it looked like he could at least fit inside it. Plus he had always found her somewhat attractive. He stripped himself and took the suit from the rack.

The suit had a peach color zipper going down the base of it's spine. Anthony undressed, and then he unzipped the suit and placed one foot inside. The suit was much tighter than it looked, as he had to pull the suit several times to wedge his feet inside. Finally, with one foot in, things became a little easier. It was almost like the suit had accepted him as its master. Anthony was able to get his other foot in with almost no trouble at all. He pulled the suit up to his waist.

Now it was really getting uncomfortable. His manhood felt completely squashed as a painful feeling off getting kicked in the groin filled his stomach. He ignored it though and began to fit his arm inside the suit's. His more muscular arms stretched Malon's thinner arms out like a bag of popcorn. He brought the torso of the suit up to his and stared down the new cleavage in front of him. Finally the head was all that remained.

Staring through the eyes of the back of the mask part of the suit, Anthony closed his own and pulled Malon's face over his. When he opened them, it was like he was in a whole new world. All he had to was close the zipper in the back and he would become Malon. Fumbling for the handle, he grasped it and slowly worked it up his spine. Until at last the zipper was shut.

Anthony waited for the longest few seconds until he felt something move in his body. His muscles bulged out, then there was a steam exhaust sound and all the muscles on his entire body slowly shrunk. He stared at his arms are they got smaller and more feminine. His hands shrunk to delicate soft woman hands. Any fat in his body lurched and spread to his chest and legs. The flat breasts of the Malon suit ballooned out in front of his eyes. His manhood no longer felt cramped, in fact he didn't think it was there anymore.

As the changes finished up he felt a twinge in his entire body. Slowly his world began to grew around him.

"Wooaaah." Anthony said in a female voice that he guessed was Malon's as he shrunk down to near 5 feet.
1222312.title: Older Malon suit.

122232.title: Romani?

1223.content: Which timeline will the girl be from?
1223.title: more choices

122311.content:
As you browse through the racks of suits, one in particular catches your eye. It is Medli, the young Rito girl from The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker. You always though she was sort of cute, but her suit seemed far too small for you to fit into without ripping it or stretching it like an inflated balloon. Still, you figured you might as well try it out.

You take Medli's suit off the rack, and remove your own clothing. The suit had an opening at the back, running from the base of her neck down to just above her bottom. You slowly worm one leg into the suit, somehow managing to work your own foot down into Medli's bird-like one. It definitely wasn't comfortable; your foot felt very cramped, and the suit looked a bit stretched due to you being larger than Medli was. Medli's whole leg only ended up coming up to your knee. But you didn't let that deter you. You put your other leg into the suit, although it goes a lot more smoothly this time.

With that done, you bend down to put your arms into the suit. Medli's small hands balloon out as your larger ones fit inside. You try to stand up straight, as you had been hunched over in order to put your arms in while still having your legs in, and that's when the magic starts. Your back does straighten out, but instead of rising up, you body just shrinks inside the suit. Your limbs work themselves into place as they shorten in length to match Medli's and the limbs of the suit deflate back to their normal size as your limbs inside of them do the same.You feel a discomfort in your groin, as your manhood shrinks away, morphing into something matching what the suit has. Within moments, the world seems a lot larger, as you now possess Medli's body from the neck down. All that remains is to put on the head of the suit and zip it up.

You pull the head of the suit over your own, and match the features of the the suit up to your own s best you can. You reach behind yourself and fumble with the zipper with your now smaller hands. It takes a little bit, but you eventually manage to work the zipper all the way shut, and it seems to disappear after that. You'd be worried, but you should be able to take it off whenever you want, so the zipper disappearing shouldn't be a problem.

Rocking back and forth on your small, bird-like feet, you take a moment to just take this all in. You now have Medli's entire body, naked at that. Her clothes sat on the shelf next to where you had gotten her suit from, but the warehouse also had the clothes of all sorts of other characters if you wanted to try them on. Although, now that you were Medli, you should be able to use her wings and fly, and that was something you were very excited to try out, clothed or not.

Surely there must be something you like that'll fit your current body.

12331.title: Blaze the Cat

choices: You go into Blaze's world, freezing time in your world till you return.
Someone you know calls for you in the woods before you can go.
123311.content:
You're kinda skeptical about this whole thing, but it seems like a lot of effort to do something like this for a prank. While looking through the section dedicated to video game characters, you see a subsection dedicated to girls from the Sonic the Hedgehog series. You've been a fan of these games for a while.

One suit stands out to you: Blaze the Cat. You've admired her for her strength and no-nonsense attitude. The note said you can let a character's personality be in control if the wearer wanted, meaning you can watch that cool, calm, determined hero firsthand.

No, you can BE that cool, calm, determined hero!

You practically jump at the thought, and grab the suit off the rack, not caring if this is a prank. Without bothering to remove your clothes, you put your legs and arms into the suit, zip it up, then stick the head on. You feel a bit disappointed when nothing happens. You then realize that you need to take your clothes off first. You get out of the suit, take off your clothes, and get back in the suit.

Suddenly, the suit seems a bit tighter. Then a lot tighter, tight enough to start reshaping you. Your body becomes lithe and slender, the excess mass magically squeezing into your tail, chest, and over-sized head, or simply vanishing entirely. You feel your skin covered in soft fur instead of a suit.

You open your eyes, and see a small ball of fire in front of you. In fear, you jump back into the racks as the the orb disappears. You wonder where it went, only to have it suddenly appear in front of you again.

You hesitantly reach out to touch it, and find it doesn't burn you. In fact, it feels quite nice. You remember now that Blaze could control fire and couldn't be burned, and after you became her, now you can too. You mentally move the fireball about experimentally, before snuffing it out.

"Amazing." You say in Blaze's voice. Talk about an understatement. Turning around, you see that there are mirrors behind each rack. You look at yourself, feeling a bit embarrassed about being naked, even if nobody is around except for the walls of staring costumes. You reach for the shelf next to the rack you got the Blaze costume from, taking her clothes and putting them on.

"Much better." You say looking in the mirror again. You wonder how you can use Blaze's memories, but figure that that can wait till you've taken her form for a high-speed spin through her world.
123311.title: Burning desire.

choices: Go looking for adventure! You explore the palace and nearby town.
Adventure comes to you! Eggman Nega attacks the palace!
1233111.content:
You look over the shelf where you got Blaze's clothes, and see the seven Sol Emeralds just sitting there, as well as a fistful of rings. You're a bit surprised by this, before you remember that the note said that almost all items the character had owned at some point would be on the shelves for the owner to use.

You realize that you could easily take any items from any character wherever you wanted to, but decide to keep it simple for now and just just take the rings and Sol Emeralds for now. You reach out to take an emerald, only to find that once you grab it, it disappears!

You wonder where it went, before reaching behind you and pulling the emerald seemingly out of thin air. Oh! You think. Sonic characters use Hammerspace to keep their stuff from becoming a hinderence. You pick up the other six emeralds and a few rings, before heading into the center of the warehouse.

As the note described, in the center of the room is a large cylindrical machine, connected to what lookslike a fairly old supercomputer, designed to transport people who had worn the suits to the series where their character belonged. You start the machine up, following the steps the machine gives you carefully.

When it asks you to choose what time to enter the series, you pick a week after the events of Sonic Rush Adventure. The machine informs you that you will be placed where Blaze would normally be at that point in time, and asks if you are sure you want to proceed.

"Very yes!" You say, clicking yes.

The doors to the cylinder open, and you step into the dark machine. You hear a hum from the machine, and feel a blast of energy, knocking you out.

You wake up in a large, comfortable bed, in a dark, but elegantly decorated room. You look out of a large window, near a door to a balcony, and see the moon and stars shining brightly in the night sky. Turning around, you head to the only other door in the room, trying to figure out where you are.

When you open it however, you open it too quickly, and accidentally knock over a koala in uniform.

"Ow! Assassins! Somebody sound the alarm!" He hurriedly picks himself up off the ground and points his spear at you. "You're not going anywhere...." He stops when he gets a better look at you. "Your majesty!" He says with a tone of shame in his voice. "Pardon me, your majesty. I'm a bit jumpy tonight."

"It's alright, Guardon." You tell him, Blaze's memories automatically telling you the captain of the guard's name. "I'm feeling disoriented myself. I think I need a quick walk to get my bearings."

"As you you wish, your majesty." Guardon says. "Just be careful not to spook my troops."

You give a thankful nod, and start your slow walk down the halls of what you guess to be Blaze's palace. Beautiful vases, plants, and statues, as well as decorative weapons and suits of armor line the halls. All the doors are closed, and aside from the guards, there aren't any people, but you chalk that up to the fact that you are apparently up so late.

As you come back to your room, you can't help but wonder if you might get a chance to meet Sonic and his friends tomorrow, before remembering that Blaze lives a dimension apart from them, meaning the chances of that aren't promising.

But, You think as you close the door to Blaze's room. That doesn't mean I can't have an adventure of my own tomorrow! And with that, you curl up into Blaze's bed and go to sleep.
1233111.title: A trip to Blaze's world.

choices: Start in the nearby town. You might make some new freinds.
Start by searching the surrounding countryside.
12331111.content:
You wake up as sunlight pours in through the window and onto your bed. You slowly get up and stretch, warming yourself in the light. You decide to start off with a shower, Blaze's memories guiding you the washroom. Like your bedroom, it is very large and elegantly decorated, with fine tile floors, large mirrors and beautiful paintings.

You take off your clothes and start up the water in the shower. It feels quite nice at first, but soon the water starts to weigh down your fur. Speaking of which, washing a body covered in fur turns out to be quite time consuming, and you go through three bottles of shampoo before completely cleaning yourself.

When you try to dry yourself off, neither the towel nor blow-dryer seem particularly effective. How long does this take? You grumble, tossing the towel to the floor before, in your frustration, covering yourself completely in flames, which ends up getting you perfectly dry. Wow. That'll save me some effort next time. You think.

Still, You think, as you put your clothes back on. I wonder how anyone without fire powers has the patience to bother with washing and drying fur.

You exit the washroom, ready to get breakfast. You head down the same halls you walked last night. This time, the halls are filed with maids, servants, and politicians scurrying from room to room, trying to keep everything in order.

You enter the dining hall, where a canine maid quickly sits you down at a long table. "I'll get you the usual, your majesty." She says, before leaving for the kitchen. She comes back a few minutes later with tray covered in fruits and pastries, all of which smell delicious.

You thank her, and begin to eat. After you are satisfied, you put the leftovers into hammerspace for later. You then leave the dining hall and head outside to the palace garden where a lovely selection of flowers, hedges, and trees are on display. Ignoring them for now, you go to the palace gates. Once you're outside, you wonder where to start your exploration.
12331111.title: Sunrise in the castle
