124111.content:
"Unreal." you said as you slowly walked through the creepy warehouse.

You made sure to close the door behind you, so you could keep the wind out. You didn't want to catch a cold after all. Once that was done, you decided to look around. There were rows and rows of costumers, ranging from any kind of fiction you could think of. Turning a nearby light on, it really showed how much was really there.

"How are all these here?" You asked yourself, to no answer.

Anyway, you kept walking down, seeing if anything caught your eye. There were many costumes from famous anime and video games and such, so you had a wide range to look at. However, you accidentally slipped on a small rock, hitting your head hard on one rack, causing something to fall on you.

"Ouch!"

Rubbing your head, you looked at what fell on you. You looked up to see that the Fire Emblem section was above you, so you looked at what fell. It was an orange tunic of some kind, with some familiar orange gloves and black stockings. Your eyes widened once your brain came to the right solution.

"This is Mia's outfit."

Mia was a character from Path of Radiance, later appearing in Radiant Dawn. It was a great transition for the series to go from 2D to 3D, but that was beside the point. What were you to do now? You had this costume, but what exactly were you to do? Try it on? You looked back up to where the clothes feel on you, seeing a body costume with Mia's hair on top. Your mind entertained the idea of putting it on, but wouldn't that be weird? Still, there was no one here, so you could do it without shame.

Going with that option, you stripped your clothes off, bringing the body suit to you. You tried inserting your legs in, which oddly seemed to fit, despite how Mia was younger than you were. Still, you took that as a sign and kept going, putting your hands through the arm sleeves. Putting your head inside and adjusting it, you reached down for the zipper, zipping it up as much as you could. Soon, it was down, and you had never felt more bizarre.

"What am I....AGH!"

Suddenly, it felt like the suit came to life or something, as if crawling on your skin. The suit started suppressing on you, almost like a second skin. It especially pushed against your chest and groin, making them feel really tight. It started as discomfort, but soon grew into slight pain, causing you to fall to the ground, panting as you slowly felt them fade away. However, as they did, you saw dark hair fly into your face, causing you to comb it away.

"What just happened?" You immediately clasped your hands over your mouth, hearing a voice much different from your own. You slowly forced yourself up, seeing what seemed to be average breasts on your chest. You blushed immediately when you saw them, as you pretty much knew what was between your legs by now. Even without the wind, it was pretty cold, so you immediately went over and grabbed her clothing. After getting on the panties and bra as best you could, on went the sleeveless orange tunic. The black belt that held her sword went on next, followed by the orange and black gloves. The shoulder guards were on next, which surprisingly wasn't too hard, followed by the black stockings and shoes. Finishing the look, you saw Mia's white headband in the back, putting that on as well.

"Oh my gosh, I'm actually her."
124111.title: During Path of Radiance

1241111.content:
Needless to say, skirts and cold nights did not go well together, as your legs and arms were a bit cold from the night air. You began to wonder if you should just get out of this costume and leave, maybe come back in the morning. Then again, your parents would like to know where you were going, so that probably won't work. What were you to do?

Still, seeing yourself in this body was a bit appealing. Not that you were a pervert or anything, but Mia was really cute. She was a quick favorite of yours from the game after all. The fact that there was a costume such as this still felt so unreal to you, yet it wasn't really bad. However, that still left you at the question of what you should do now.

You decided to look around a bit more, maybe even find a better costume if you came across it. However, you didn't seem to be in the mood for changing even as you looked. Eventually, as you turned a corner, something caught your eye. It appeared to be some kind of machine, with a containment unit and some keypad in the front. As much as your sci-fi instincts were telling you to stay away, your curiosity was stronger.

"What's this?" You walked right over, looking at the computer in front. You knew some things about computers, but not so much about code and the like. There was an option there, saying "Transfer?" with a "Yes/No" option. What did this thing do? Well, since you had come this far, you might as well check all of it out. You pressed down on the "Yes" option, with several lines of code appearing with a message.

"Confirmed. Please step inside."

While obviously a computer voice, you looked around to see what it was talking about. Suddenly, you saw the containment unit open, just like in the movies. You shielded your eyes from the bright light, looking inside to see what it was. However, the very second your whole body entered, the door slammed shut, shocking you.

"What the?! Hey, let me out!" You banged your hands against the door, but nothing happened. You soon heard the voice again, apparently counting down.

"4......3......2.......1......Begin."

You braced for impact as best you could, but all you saw was light as you blacked out.
1241111.title: Problem

12412.content: Which version (the main differences are the voice and eyes)?
12412.title: Micaiah

124121.content:
http://www.serenesforest.net/media/fe10i...

"What an odd note" you muttered to yourself. The note said something about "suits" and that they were supposedly very special and all. You didn't really see what the big deal was with them all.

"Might as well take a look around" you decided and began walking around the warehouse. Almost immediately, you wondered over to the video games section, since that was your favorite anyway. Looking around, you could see suits made from many female characters.

"Wonder if there's any Fire Emblem suits in there" you wondered and looked closer at that particular section. Eventually, you found suits resembling the characters from that particular series. You smiled ad you discovered it and took a closer look. Your eyes eventualyl fell on one suit in particular.

"Is that Micaiah?" you asked yourself. You reached a hand in and grabbed the suit, pulling it towards yourself. When you got it completely out, you saw that it was indeed Micaiah.

Micaiah was a favorite of yours. In your opinion, she was one of the best Lord-type characters in the series. Not many seemed to like her, but you especially did. There was something very alluring about her, and she appealed to you. However, you noticed something else about it. The suit was naked, as in not having any clothes. Turning your head, you could see a stash of Micaiah's regular clothing next to where you got the suit.

"Um, not really what I needed to see. Oh well, might as well humor this thing" you decided on. You remembered the note you found at the beginning but you decided that it would be best to try things out first hand. However, the first thing you realized was that you pretty much had to strip down to put the suit on.

"Figures" you muttered as you put the suit down and began stripping off your clothes. A chilld wind seemed to make its way in as your skin was exposed.

"Brr, little chilly" you said as you finished taking your boxers off, completely exposing yourself. You could only hope that no one else barged in while you were doing this. Putting that aside, you grabbed the suit again and looked it over. There was a zipper in the back. Without hesitation, you pulled it down, opening it up for you.

"Here we go" you said as you slowly placed one leg in the suit to try it out. You knew that you were probably a bit bigger than Micaiah, and that might break the suit when you thought about it. However, your leg seemed to effortlessly fit into the legging of the suit.

"Guess it's all good" you said as you placed your other leg into the suit and placed it all the way in. Once that was done, you placed your arms through the smaller openings. To your slight surprise, they fitted in just as well. With that done, you pulled your head into the opening for Micaiah's head. Inside, you could see through the openings for Micaiah's eyes and mouth.

"Hmm, nothing out of the ordinary" you muttered to yourself. You then realized that you had left the zipper undone in the back. Reaching back, you pulled on the zipper until you got it back up to the base of your neck, where it ended.

"Hmm, is that all?" you asked yourself.

Boy, were you wrong.
124121.title: Normal

choices: End up going to the game world
1241211.content:
Suddenly, a small burning sensation began to spread throughout your body. It wasn't entirely painful but it was enough to make you fall to the ground, clutching your body.

"Ow! What the heck?!" you yelled out, hoping for the sensation to end. As it was happening, it almost felt as if the skin was crawling all over your body, like it was becoming closer to your skin than it was before. You didn't really know what it meant but you weren't really focused on that, given your current condition.

Then, as suddenly as it came, it stopped.

You collasped to the ground, breathing hard. That was something you definately didn't want to feel again.

"What was that about?" you asked before gasping. That was not your voice! Your hands went to your mouth, and you realized that they were smaller and more delicate than normal. Looking around, it didn't look like you were looking out of holes anymore. As you flipped your head around, long silver locks of hair flew into your face. Your eyes widened in realization after seeing the silver hair.

"Wait! This is...." you started before looking down over your body. It was, in a sense, the same Micaiah body suit you had just changed into. Except, this time, the skin felt real. The hips, waist, breasts, hair, and everything else all felt so real.

"Unreal" you muttered to yourself in what you assumed to be Micaiah's voice. However, before you could think anymore of it, you realized that your new sensitive skin felt bitter against the chilly wind.

"First, clothes" you said in a bit of a hurry. You didn't want to catch a cold or anything. You found Micaiah's clothes where you first saw them and laid them out. The first thing you needed were the undergarments, which composed of a white bra and panties. Nothing too out of the ordinary.

After taking a minute of figuring out how to get your breasts into the cups, you slid a pair of tight black leggings over your feet and legs and brought them up to your waist. The tights covered everything, even the feet entirely. Next, you followed it up with the pair of tan-colored boots, which also had a bit of a heel to them. You slim them up your legs, using the red lace to tie them around your upper calves and knees.

After that, you picked up the purple top that Micaiah wore and slid that over your head, making sure the dress part of it stayed down. You then wrapped a brown belt around your waist that helped keep it down. For your arms, you put on a pair of black sleeves that were fingerless and went up to your bicep. To top it all off, you took the large blue scarf and wrapped it around your neck.

You didn't really need a mirror. You knew by now that you looked exactly like Micaiah.

"Unreal" was all you could say.

Suddenly, you looked further in and noticed a machine there. It was kind of hard to describe but it certainly looked futuristic.

"What does that do?" you asked yourself as your approached it. Along the way, you almost lost your balance, thanks to both the heels on Micaiah's boots and your new center of gravity.

"That will be a pain to handle" you grumbled as you walked closer to the machine. There laid some instructions as to what the machine could do. One of the things you noticed was that it could make this suit your official skin, therefore turning your old body into a new suit for you to turn back into later.

"Sounds good" you said as you pressed the appropriate buttons to activate the program you wanted. Then, what looked like a laser shot from the machine, engulfing you in it's brightness. When it died down, the skin oddly felt even more comfortable. Then, you looked at the floor and saw what was your old body, laying as a plain body suit.

"Wow, so this stuff does work" you said out loud. This was somewhat confusing but getting pretty cool that you could take these forms whenever you wished like this. Getting it out of the way, you placed your old body suit with your old clothes in the same spot where you got Micaiah's suit.

Now what do you do?
1241211.title: A New Skin

12412111.content:
After placing the suit on the shelft, you returned to the machine. You were interested in seeing more of what it could do.

"So, what's this?" you asked yourself, pressing another button on the machine. However, while you figured out how to swap your skin out, you had no idea what this button did. You probably should have waited to figure out what the machine does first. The machine began charging with energy, causing it to glow.

"That doesn't look good" you said, taking a step back. Before you were about run and get away, the machine engulfed you in a burst if radiant light, blinding you and lighting up the warehouse. Then the light dissipated within the warehouse, you were nowhere in sight.

*****The Space between Worlds*****

"W...Where am I?" you said hazily as you tried to keep your eyes open. All you see was swirls of light surrounding you. You couldn't really figure out what it all meant. Your mind was too hazy to think straight.

"Where.....am....I... going?" you said with a soft voice as you closed your eyes and blacked out again, unable to stay consious any longer.

*****New World*****

Unlike when you felt like you were laying on clouds before, you suddenly felt like you had faceplanted on a hard rocky surface.

"Ugh, what hit me?" you asked out loud as you slowly crept to your feet. You stretched your arms and legs, trying to get the aches out of your limps. You had no idea what that huge light show was about. However, you would soon get your answer. As you stretched out, your eyes caught your surroundings.

You no longer saw the walls of the warehouse, or any city you remembered. All you saw were levels of wooden and rocky houses with numerous stairs connecting them all. You looked further upwards, seeing that the elevation seemed to get higher as you looked up. At the very top of where you see, a huge dark castle sat on the top. You gasped as you realized where you were. You were no longer at the warehouse, or even in the same country or dimension.

You were in Nevassa, the capitol of Daein!

"You're kidding me!" you almost yelled out, as your foot hit something on the ground. You looked down to see a bright yellow tome on the ground. Picking it up, you realized that it had to be a Light tome.

"So...I'm now stuck in Tellius....and in Micaiah's body?" you slowly stated out loud. This was almost overwhelming to you. While part of you thought it was cool to see Tellius up close and personal, the fact that you just thrust into a war that you could easily die in didn't make you feel comfortable.

Suddenly, you heard yelling and clashes of metal from nearby.

"Who's that?" you wondered as you began running in the general direction of the sounds. After rounding around a house, you could see Edward, a myrmidon, fighting a bandit by himself. Looking over to the left, you also saw Leonardo, an archer, standing by and getting ready to strike from long distance.

"I must be in the Prologue. So, I'm stuck at the beginning of the story as a woman. Joy" you muttered sarcastically.
12412111.title: End up going to the game world

124121111.content:
Honestly, the last thing you wanted to do was get involved. You were just an average boy a while ago. How in the world would you stand a chance fighting in a war-torn country? However, you had to think about this logically. You were Micaiah now; essentially the de facto leader of the Dawn Brigade and the one who keeps morale up. You fleeing would screw that image up. Not to mention that it could also screw the story up, or end with you captured or dead.

Talk about a lose-lose situation. You gulped to yourself and began to fun forwards towards the fight, all the while thinking that you were dead meat.

"Micaiah! Glad to see you. A little birdy told me you'd be here. Yours actually" said Leonardo, finding some time to talk to you. You smiled a bit, remembering him saying something like that from the game. Immediately, you shook your head. You had to stop thinking of this as a game. It's real enough, certainly enough to get you killed if you're reckless. Game over is permanent after all (especially in this series).

"Yune got to you? Great!" you replied, trying to play the part as well you could. Although, being a girl who could see the future was as far from normal as you could get.

"Hey, if you're done chatting, perhaps you can help?!" yelled Edward. You looked over to see them fighting a fighter, one of the stronger axe-wielders around. You knew that this had to be the boss, so Edward would have a little trouble with him.

"I'll go. You watch for any reinforcements" you told Leonardo, trying to sound in command. It apparently worked because Leonardo nodded without hesitation and turned to watch for any enemies. You ran forward towards where Edward was fighting the enemy leader.

"This is insane. How am I supposed to fight when I don't even know how to use this" you thought, referring to your Light tome. As you thought this, you reached a good point where you could probably land a long-range strike. Making sure the leader was too focused on Edward, you opened the tome, looking for some hints.

"Gibbersh. Total gibberish" you muttered to yourself. This was infuriating to say the least. You were useless in this situation.

"Ahhhhhh!" cried Edward, taking a cut to the side. It wasn't crippling, but he was totally wide open now. The leader smirked, assured of his vitory over the swordsman. You gasped and tried to think of a way to save him. As you panicked, your mind flashed for a split-second. Sudenly, you felt different, like you were still in control, and yet you weren't at the same time. Before you could think, words arose out of your mouth.

"O light, gather and open my path" you spoke. The language was unfamiliar to you, yet a part of your mind was able to translate the words. The gears in your head began to spin before clicking. It was the Serenes language, used for magic spells in this land.

At the command, a ball of light appeared above the leader before spearating into smaller strands of light and striking the bandit leader a deadly blow. He didn't even know what hit him before he collapsed dead on the ground.

You couldn't believe it. You actually did it. You used magic!
124121111.title: Under Gray Skies

1241211111.content:
On the inside, you were stunned. You had seen magic being used right before your eyes. Part of you couldn't believe that it was real. However, something more disturbing came to your attention. Seeing Edward about to be struck down seemed to ignite something within you, and it was like something guided your hand to use magic. Somehow, on the outside, you exerted a certain calm and started to walk towards Edward.

"What is this?" you thought as you approached Edward and crouched down to his level. Still on autopilot, you moved your hand to an injured spot on Edward and closed your eyes. You didn't know what was happening until you felt that same feeling fill you up before a light blue glow enveloped your hand. Going back to your game knowledge, this had to be Micaiah's special talent: Sacrifice, which healed most wounds. After Edward looked healed, the feeling of being on autopilot left you, and you felt total control again, leading to more confusion.

"Thanks a bunch Micaiah! One more hit and I'd be finished" said Edward, sheepishly grinning. You were a little annoyed that he'd be so casual about it. Then again, alot of young sword-wielders were casual, so he fit. You shook your head, trying to keep appearances up while you tried to figure out what just happened.

"Thanks lady!" yelled a young voice. You turned around and saw a young boy and his mother. Remembering them from the game, you had a small conversation, which involved the mom saying that the Begnion Occupation soldiers were just allowing the bandits to roam free. Speak of the devil though, they appeared when the conversation was over.

"Hey! You over there!" yelled one solider, wearing the customary red armor of Begnion. You glared a bit at them, forgeting your worries for the moment, as you remembered how these soldiers treated Daein citizens like slaves.

"Well well, look who decided to show up" said Edward sarcastically. Honestly, you wanted to take these soldiers out, feeling a little more confident after taking the bandit leader down. However, you felt a tug on your shoulder before long.

"Micaiah, we can't take them on now! We have to retreat!" said Leonardo. You thought about it and nodded. You knew that you had to keep a low profile for a while. There was no Daein Army at the moment so you needed to exercise caution.

"I'll settle my thoughts on that way back" you thought to yourself as you said good bye to the mother and son and left with Edward and Leonardo through the alley way, making for a rather easy escape, since there were very little soldiers to get away from.

******Few minutes later******

"I think we lost them. Too easy" said Edward.

"Don't let youe guard down. We got to get back to the hideout. Hopefully, Nolan and Sothe will meet us there shortly" said Leonardo, earning a nod from you. You needed some peace to sort things out in this strange world.

*****Meanwhile******

"Ahhhhh!" yelled a soldier as a lance was impaled through him, dealing a critical blow. The other soldiers cringed as their leader, Jarod, a halberdier and leader of the Occupation Army, withdrew his lance from the corpse and tossed it aside, blood leaking out. Jarod was mad to say the least and immediately ordered a search of the area, causing the soldiers to leave since they valued their life.

After they left, Jarod looked over the keep and grinned. This little event intriuged him greatly.

"Good. Things were getting a little too dull here. A little fresh game is just what I need" he smirked.
1241211111.title: Outcome of the battle

124131.title: Female Ike

choices: Scream! Scream like the girl you are!
1241312.content:
Scanning the rows of costumes, Anthony saw a device that stood out from everything around it. He checked it out and found that it could create suits. He experimented with it, and came to female Ike costumes. He figured that whoever created everything there had seen some pictures. He decided to create one of the Ike suits for fun, since it wasn't like trying one on could hurt anything...

The suit came out and Anthony examined it as he took off his clothes. He was actually half a head taller than the costume itself, so he figured it'd be a tight fit. He was therefore kind of surprised when his legs and stomache slid in the spots they were meant to go in with no stretching, and only a bit of tingling. He noticed the same thing when he put his arms in the arms of the suit, and with that, putting the remaining part of his torso in. He finished by putting his head into the suit's head area as well. Then he zipped up the back, and was amazed at how natural the skin felt on him. He could feel the cold air, which was odd because he should have been hot in the rubber bodysuit, and he could feel his bare feet on the ground, which he also shouldn't be able to feel since they were also in the suit, along with his hair, which was longer and in a ponytail, on his back and shoulders. He lifted his hands and felt all over the bodysuit… and realized something, something impossible.

He saw a full-length mirror in the corner, and ran over to it to have a look. Sure enough, he had become Iko, a female version of Ike.
1241312.title: Iko? Of course!

12413121.content:
Anthony screamed – not a masculine “Aaaagh!” scream, but a more feminine “Kyaaaaah!” scream. She had actually turned into a girl!

Once she got over the shock factor, she moved closer to the mirror. “Interesting.” She said. Her new voice was deep, low, monotone, and sarcastic-sounding, but undeniably feminine. She lifted her hands to her new assets and hefted them. “Iko’s really got a nice pair of hooters.” She noted.
12413121.title: Scream! Scream like the girl you are!

1241321.content:
"Unreal." you said as you slowly walked through the creepy warehouse.

There were rows upon rows of suits, seemingly ranging from any kind of fiction. This began to make you wonder if you could find suits from one of your favorite series. That would be Fire Emblem.

"Hmm, would they have those here?" you wondered out loud.

Looking through the rows, you were delighted to find exactly what you were looking for: a Fire Emblem section. There were so many, as you would expect from such a series. Looking through some all, one caught your attention. It was a bit hard to tell with the suits being naked not having complete faces, but there was one with pink hair that you recognized. Holding up one end of the suit, you could make out just enough to see that it was Marcia from the Tellius games. If you were right, this was the one from Radiant Dawn. It was an intriguing find, and holding up a bit of the suit made you a bit curious about it.

"Well, maybe I should...." you pondered to yourself. This whole thing was kind of weird. Why would you try on a suit from his weird place and all? Then again, you had a certain curiosity about these kinds of things. With that in mind, you went and stripped off your regular clothes, feeling a little cool from the slight chill. Thinking quickly, you tried to put the suit on.

"Wait, isn't she smaller than me?" you asked yourself. However, the legging you put your leg in seemed to fit your leg perfectly somehow. Feeling a little weird, you took it as a sign to keep going, and you put your legs and arms into the suit. Adjusting your head into the suit, you were able to grab the zipper and zip it up to your neck.

Once you did, a discomforting squeeze covered your body, making you wince and hold yourself as you felt your body being shifted in numerous places. You could feel an emptiness forming in your groin area as well as most of your body thinning out and small orbs inflating on your chest.

After a minute, the discomforting squeezing stopped, and you collapsed to the ground, slightly exhausted.

"What the..." you started before gasping and bring your hands to your mouth. Your voice was distinctly different now, and you felt short pink hair against your shoulders.

"Wait, did I just..." you trailed off again, realizing that your body just became Marcia's entirely.

However, before you could think further, the slight chill made you shiver again. You got up and walked back over to where you found the suit, finding Marcia's Falcon Knight uniform from the game. How you managed to get all of it on confused you to no end, especially regarding the armor. Still, it was comfortable enough, if only to keep the wind off of you.
1241321.title: Sure

12413211.content:
Now that you finally got yourself at least some warmth, you had the chance to look yourself over. The full impact of now being in Marcia's body hit you, with your mind still trying to accept it.

"I can't believe I actually look like this now." you spoke, noticing how Marcia's voice now came out of your mouth. It was funny hearing it, considering that the games she was in had limited voice acting.

Of course, another question soon came. What to do now? You likely weren't going to go outside like this, so that was out of the question. However, there wasn't much else to do inside the warehouse either. What to do. What to do.

Then suddenly, you saw some flickering lights down another hall of the warehouse, coming from some kind of machine that you didn't recognize at all.

"What is something like that doing here?" you asked yourself.

You walked over, seeing the computer screen in front of you. Behind it, you could see some kind of containment unit, likely meant for someone to go into. You pressed something on the screen, instantly getting a "Transfer?" option.

"What does that mean?" you asked yourself. However, before much else happened, you ended up pressing "Yes".

"Transfer started. Please enter containment." appeared on the screen. At that, you saw the containment unit open, allowing you access. You looked inside, wanting to see what was up about it. However, before you could get out again, the door closed.

"What? Hey, what gives?!" you cried out, banging on the doors again. However, they wouldn't open, and you saw a countdown. "Uh oh."

"Transfer in 3......2........1.......Start!"

Instantly, everything around you went white, and you quickly passed out, not knowing what was happening to you.

12431121.content:
"Wow, what a place" you said to yourself in awe. Finding this warehouse underground was pure luck, but it apparently worked out well for you. There was only a tiny light illuminating the place, but you could see that there were selves of.....stuff everywhere. You walked over and tried to pick up what was there. What is was surprised you. They were suits! Tons and tons of suits, seemingly suited towards many games and shows and such.

"Wow, if it wasn't so creepy, this would be completely awesome. I wonder..." you pondered to yourself. You were wondering if one of your all-time favorite game series was here as well. The only way to find out was to look around extensively. However, as you had the series on your mind, you felt as if you were slowly being guided towards a certain destination. Shoving that aside, you found a shelf with exactly what you were looking for.

"Fire Emblem! All right" you said with a smile. As you guessed, tons of suits were there, all girls it seemed. One thing you noticed was that these suits seemed to be "naked" in a sense, with their regular clothes right next to them. You questioned this but decided to look anyway. As you looked at the many suits there, one stood out. You gently picked one up, feeling the soft surface as if it was living, and noticed the familiar face and long green hair.

"Lyn? Well, this is pretty cool" you told yourself. That's exactly who it looked like; Lyn, a character from the first Fire Emblem released in the US. In addition, she was the first playable Lord that players got to use so she was pretty significant. As for you, well you really liked her character and personality.

"Hmm, well, let's see what this is about" you said to yourself. No one was down here with you, so you might as well use the suit. You striped off your normal clothes until there was nothing on and held the suit up. You pulled the zipper down and gently put your right leg through the legging. You figured that you would probably be too big for it, considering Lyn was probably smaller than you. However, it surprisingly felt comfortable, like a glove.

This intrigued you even more, so you slipped your other foot in, feeling the same thing. Then you pulled the suit up, pulling your arms through the arms of the suit, feeling similarly comfortable.You then put your head in, adjusting it so your eyes and mouth were in the proper spots. All that was left was to zip it up. With some effort, you were were able to reach around back and zip it up to your neck.

"Unreal" was all you could say.

Suddenly, you looked further in and noticed a machine there. It was kind of hard to describe but it certainly looked futuristic.

"What does that do?" you asked yourself as your approached it. Along the way, you almost lost your balance, thanks to your new center of gravity.

"That will be a pain to handle" you grumbled as you walked closer to the machine. There laid some instructions as to what the machine could do. One of the things you noticed was that it could make this suit your official skin, therefore turning your old body into a new suit for you to turn back into later.

"Sounds good" you said as you pressed the appropriate buttons, which opened a door for you. Following its lead, you walked it and watched it close. Soon enough, you heard the machine come to life and seemingly scan you from head to toe. It was a wierd feeling as you soon witnessed a bright light engulf you. When it died down, the skin oddly felt even more comfortable. Then, you saw the door open and step outside. You looked at the floor and saw what was your old body, laying as a plain body suit.

"Wow, so this stuff does work" you said out loud. This was somewhat confusing but getting pretty cool that you could take these forms whenever you wished like this. Getting it out of the way, you placed your old body suit with your old clothes in the same spot where you got Lyn's suit.

Now what do you do?
124311211.title: Feeling the effects

1243112111.content:
"Well, now what" you muttered to yourself. You were in an underground warehouse, in the body of a video game girl, all during the middle of the night. Not exactly much to do from where you were standing. You had made this suit your own for now and neatly packed your old body on to the shelf. Now you just needed something to do.

After a while, you began walking around, still having to get used to your new body, as evidenced by your wobbling and stumbling. It was a bit annoying, although you had to get used to it if you wanted to keep this body for a while. You might as well put it back if you can't get used to it.

As you turned another corner, something caught the corner of your eye. It was another machine, bigger than the one you went into just a minute ago. There seemed to be quite a few commands, judging by the input board on the side. Part of you felt a little anxious around it, but your curiosity wanted to see what it could do.

You slowly approached the machine, learning to balance a little better, and looked at the small screen.

"Input command? What is this?" you asked, pressing a button on the keyboard. At the touch, another command came up.

"Transfer? To where? And what?" you asked. However, you wanted to see what would happen so you pressed the ENTER key on the "yes" option. At the touch of that button, the machine roared to life, making you flinch back a bit.

"Uh oh. Maybe I shouldn't have done that" you told yourself as you considered running. However, there would be none of that as a bright light emitted from the machine and englufed you as you tried to shield yourself from it.

Where do you end up?

124312.title: Female Roy?

12432.title: Shadow Dragon and FE3

1243221.content:
"Wow, what a place" you said to yourself in awe. Finding this warehouse underground was pure luck, but it apparently worked out well for you. There was only a tiny light illuminating the place, but you could see that there were selves of.....stuff everywhere. You walked over and tried to pick up what was there. What is was surprised you. They were suits! Tons and tons of suits, seemingly suited towards many games and shows and such.

"Wow, if it wasn't so creepy, this would be completely awesome. I wonder..." you pondered to yourself. You were wondering if one of your all-time favorite game series was here as well. The only way to find out was to look around extensively. However, as you had the series on your mind, you felt as if you were slowly being guided towards a certain destination. Shoving that aside, you found a shelf with exactly what you were looking for.

"Fire Emblem! All right" you said with a smile. As you guessed, tons of suits were there, all girls it seemed. One thing you noticed was that these suits seemed to be "naked" in a sense, with their regular clothes right next to them. You questioned this but decided to look anyway. As you looked at the many suits there, one stood out. You gently picked one up, feeling the soft surface as if it was living, and noticed the familiar face and long green hair.

"Tiki? Wow, sweet!" you said to yourself. Tiki was a Manakete from the Fire Emblem series. She was the most commonly seen Manakete in the series, appearing in a grand total of 4 games with one more coming in 2013. She was an incredibly cute little girl, one of your favorites. However, her young appearance hid her true age. Being a dragon, she was over 1100 years at the time of the wars with the Shadow Dragon.

"Hmm, well, let's see what this is about" you said to yourself. No one was down here with you, so you might as well use the suit. You striped off your normal clothes until there was nothing on and held the suit up. You pulled the zipper down and gently put your right leg through the legging. You figured that you would probably be too big for it, considering Tiki was incredibly smaller than you were. She was a kid after all. However,, to your surprise, your foot fit in like a glove. It was kind of cool, yet a bit bizarre.

This onfused you even more, yet you also got more excited, so you slipped your other foot in, feeling the same thing. Then you pulled the suit up, pulling your arms through the arms of the suit, feeling similarly comfortable.You then put your head in, adjusting it so your eyes and mouth were in the proper spots. All that was left was to zip it up. With some effort, you were were able to reach around back and zip it up to your neck.
1243221.title: Yes

12432211.content:
Suddenly, a small burning sensation began to spread throughout your body. It wasn't entirely painful but it was enough to make you fall to the ground, clutching your body.

"Ow! What the heck?!" you yelled out, hoping for the sensation to end. As it was happening, it almost felt as if the skin was crawling all over your body, like it was becoming closer to your skin than it was before. You didn't really know what it meant but you weren't really focused on that, given your current condition. The suit felt like it was trying to crush you, and you almost felt like it was shrinking you. That thought kind of scared you to some extent.

Then, as suddenly as it came, it stopped.

You collasped to the ground, breathing hard. That was something you definately didn't want to feel again.

"What was that about?" you asked before gasping. That was not your voice! The voice was incredibly high and childish. Your hands went to your mouth, and you realized that they were smaller and more delicate than normal. Looking around, it didn't look like you were looking out of holes anymore. As you flipped your head around, a long ponytail of green hair whipped in front of your face. Your eyes widened in realization after seeing the green hair.

"Wait! This is...." you started before looking down over your body. It was, in a sense, the same Tiki body suit you had just changed into. Except, this time, the skin felt real. The bosy and all that came with it felt so real. You felt around yourself, knowing that Tiki's body resembled that of a preteen girl, so there wasn't much to look at. Still, you got acquainted with the body, feeling around her head and noticing her pointed ears.

However, a brief chill reminded you that you were naked and needed clothes.. You didn't want to catch a cold or anything. You found Tiki's clothes where you first saw them and laid them out. The first thing you needed were the undergarments, which composed of a white top and panties. You assumed that it was some form of training bra as they probably didn't have those in the medievel world. Nothing too out of the ordinary.

First off was Tiki's pink dress that went smoothly over her small body. Pulling it down, you noticed how little of your legs it covered. Good thing the panties were actually pretty solid, covering your privates well. Following that, you found Tiki's pink scarf and wrapped it around your body. A red sash followed, you wrapping it around your waist. It was pretty long, often making you wonder how Tiki walked with it. After that, you found and put on some of Tiki's accessories, like the bracelets on her right wrist, the tiny red wrap around her left wrist, and her anklets that looked like something out of royalty. Following that, you found Tiki's red shoes and put them on. They felt wierd compared to your old shoes.

To complete the look, you found Tiki's small dragon tiara. Smiling a bit at it, you placed it gently on your head, making sure it was on right. You didn't need a mirror now. You knew that you looked like Tiki.

"Unreal" was all you could say.

Suddenly, you looked further in and noticed a machine there. It was kind of hard to describe but it certainly looked futuristic.

"What does that do?" you asked yourself as your approached it. Along the way, you almost lost your balance, thanks to your new clothing and long hair.

"That will be a pain to handle" you grumbled as you walked closer to the machine. There laid some instructions as to what the machine could do. One of the things you noticed was that it could make this suit your official skin, therefore turning your old body into a new suit for you to turn back into later.

"Sounds good" you said as you pressed the appropriate buttons, which opened a door for you. Following its lead, you walked it and watched it close. Soon enough, you heard the machine come to life and seemingly scan you from head to toe. It was a wierd feeling as you soon witnessed a bright light engulf you. When it died down, the skin oddly felt even more comfortable. Then, you saw the door open and step outside. You looked at the floor and saw what was your old body, laying as a plain body suit.

"Wow, so this stuff does work" you said out loud. This was somewhat confusing but getting pretty cool that you could take these forms whenever you wished like this. Getting it out of the way, you placed your old body suit with your old clothes in the same spot where you got Tiki's suit.

Now what do you do?

As you turned another corner, something caught the corner of your eye. It was another machine, bigger than the one you went into just a minute ago. There seemed to be quite a few commands, judging by the input board on the side. Part of you felt a little anxious around it, but your curiosity wanted to see what it could do.

You slowly approached the machine, learning to balance a little better, and looked at the small screen.

"Input command? What is this?" you asked, pressing a button on the keyboard. At the touch, another command came up.

124331.title: Lucina?

1243311.content:
"Wow, what a place" You said to yourself in awe. Finding this warehouse underground was pure luck, but it apparently worked out well for you. There was only a tiny light illuminating the place, but you could see that there were selves of.....stuff everywhere. You walked over and tried to pick up what was there. What is was surprised you. They were suits! Tons and tons of suits, seemingly suited towards many games and shows and such.

"Wow, if it wasn't so creepy, this would be completely awesome. I wonder..." You pondered to yourself. You were wondering if one of your all-time favorite game series was here as well. The only way to find out was to look around extensively. However, as you had the series on your mind, you felt as if you were slowly being guided towards a certain destination. Shoving that aside, you found a shelf with exactly what you were looking for.

"Fire Emblem! All right" You exclaimed with a smile. As you guessed, tons of suits were there, all girls it seemed. One thing you noticed was that these suits seemed to be "naked" in a sense, with their regular clothes right next to them. You questioned this but decided to look anyway. As you looked at the many suits there, one stood out. You gently picked one up, feeling the soft surface as if it was living, and noticed the familiar face and long blue hair.

"Wait, isn't this Lucina?" You wondered aloud. That's exactly who it looked like; Lucina, a character from Fire Emblem: Awakening, you really liked this girl. She was kind, had a strong sense of duty, and was just all around great, especially for a female Lord.

"Hmm, well, let's see what this is about." You said to yourself. No one was down here with you, so you might as well use the suit. You stripped off your normal clothes until there was nothing on and held the suit up. You pulled the zipper down and gently put your right leg through the legging. You figured that you would probably be too big for it, considering Lucina was probably smaller than you. However, it surprisingly felt comfortable, like a glove.

1243311.title: Lucina

12433111.content:
As soon as your hand left the zipper, an immediate tingle surged through your body, almost paralyzing you in place, but it wasn't painful. Something was going on with this suit, and you felt as if ants were crawling up your skin. Suddenly, the skin felt like it began to tighten, forcing some discomfort. Your teeth grinded together as you tried to get through it. Through this, you were able to raise a shaking hand to to your face. However, your eyes widened in shock as the hand began to look natural, not like a hand in a suit. This feeling extended to your other hand, as well as both of your arms.

As your mind raced to comprehend this, a pressure began forming in your chest. You looked down in horror to see the two formorly lifeless breasts come to life, filling up in front of you. Your hands raced to cover them, and you were shocked to feel how real they now were, like you really had them. This compressing feeling extended down your legs, and then down to your feet, making the suit overtop feel real. A similar compressin occured in your groin, as the suits womanhood forced on it's way into your own. Before another though crossed your mind, your head began to itch, as the long blue hair of the suit merged with you to become your own hair. Suddenly, it didn't seem as if you were looking out of a mask, and the face of the suit felt like it was your normal one. As your mind raced, the event stopped as quickly as it came, and you collapsed to the ground, briefly blacking out.

When you came too, you immediately noticed how cold it suddenly felt. Wrapping your arms around yourself, the event from before came back to your mind, and you looked over your body in shock. No longer did your body look masculine at all. All there were was soft feminine curved and hefty breasts. A hand on your head confirmed the long hair that now flowed from your head.

"Did that just happen?" You wondered aloud, before your hands clasped over your mouth. That voice was dinstinctly feminine, and you recognized it as Lucina's. Somehow, this suit had transformed you into her. Well, not totally it seemed, as you briefly touched your neck and found that the zipper was still there, although it felt harder to pull down.

As you made the conclusion that this suit transformed you, you needed to get some clothes on before you got a cold. Going back over, you found Lucina's outfit from the game. The outfit was mostly blue like the game and you had not much trouble getting the clothes on, although the bra took some effort.

After that, you found a mirror close by and looked at yourself. You gasped slightly as you saw Lucina's real form standing in that mirror.
12433111.title: Immediate effects

124331112.content:
"Unreal." you wondered out loud as your hands traveled over your new body.

It certainly felt surreal, being in not only a video game character's body, but a girl on top of it. Using in closer, you could even see the Brand of the Exalt in your left eye, which thankfully didn't hinder any eyesight.

"Thankfully." you laughed gently to yourself. However, right as you said that, you heard knocking. Very loud knocking.

"Hey Anthony! You in there?!" yelled a male voice. You jumped a bit since you recognized it instantly. It was James, your friend and fellow video game fan who came with your family. How did he find this place? Did he see you come in?

"Anthony!!" he knocked even louder. James was quite insistent when he wanted to be. You sighed and looked yourself over again. Did you want to reveal yourself to him like this? Lucina was James' favorite female Fire Emblem lord, but even he would this bizarre.

"Well, it might be a good surprise for him." you said as you walked towards the door, getting a grasp for walking with the new body. As James kept knocking, you slowly opened the door.

"Hello." you said nonchalantly in Lucina's voice. As you thought, James was standing right there, and the guy was stunned in shock at what he saw.

"W-What the...." he started. Before he could continue though, you looked around, not seeing anyone else, and shushed him.

"Long story, just get in before anyone else comes." you said quickly as you grabbed James' arm and pulled him in.

*****One long explanation later*****

"Wow, so that's the story." sighed James, after hearing your explanation.

"You obviously believe me right?" you asked.

"Well yeah, the proof is right in front of me. If I do say, you do have good taste." smiled James.

"Very funny." you sighed. Then you turned to him again. "Hey, let's pick one out for you. Let's have some fun with this."

"Well....sure, but which one?" asked James, a bit more careful on this than you were.

But you had one in mind.
124331112.title: Taking it all in

1243311121.content:
"Oh, I think I've got a good one." you smiled as you walked over to the rack.

"I swear, you're getting too excited about this. Not only that, not sure I can trust you to pick something good out." said James.

"What do you mean by that?" you asked, giving him a bit of a stern look.

"Well, Lucina's sense of anything clothes-related is terrible. I certainly hope that doesn't effect you." James smirked.

"Very funny." you rolled your eyes at him. However, you were positive that had nothing to do with it, so you got to where you were looking and grabbed a suit. Smirking, you walked over to James.

"Here you go." you said with a smile, tossing the suit to him. James caught it, and immediately recognized it by the long, flowing red hair.

"Cordelia? Why her?" he asked. You figured he would guess correctly. He played the game as much as you did.

"Why not? You like her right? You groaned for hours about how she was portrayed." you said in a matter-of-fact way of speaking.

"Well yeah. Whose bright idea was it to make her another Catria? She got snubbed big time." defended James. You kept smirking at him, which quite honestly, looked wierd on Lucina's face.

"Well, then you have your answer. Try being her yourself." you reasoned. James still looked unsure. Who wouldn't be, given the bizarreness of the situation.

"All right, you win. Just don't laugh." said James. With that, James tripped his own clothes off, although he asked you to turn away. Your response was that you were both guys, although James was quick to say that he didn't see two guys here. Shrugging, you gave in and turned away. James was always insecure about that kind of stuff. Just the kind of guy he was.

"Okay, so now the zipper, right?" he asked. You responded by saying yes. Soon enough, you heard the zipping of the suit.

"Okay, so now what...." James started to say before he felt the suit conforming against him. Just like you, he felt the discomfort and nearly fell to the ground. Wanting to help him out, you ran over and helped him stay upright, as you could see the suit forming his new womanly assets against his body. James felt his body twist and turn into Cordelia's hourglass form, and soon felt her long red hair flowing against him.

Just like with you, it was soon over. As James layed on the floor, breathing hard and shivering slightly from the cold air, you immediately ran over and grabbed Cordelia's pegasus knight uniform.

"Here, befoe you catch a cold." you said.

A minute or so later, you helped James put on Cordelia's red uniform and white armor, becoming a replica of her.

"This...is unreal." James said, gasping slightly as his new voice.

"Cool, right?" you smiled at him.
1243311121.title: Cordelia

12433111211.content:
"Got used to it yet?" you smirked at James.

"Oh shut up!" retorted James. James had taken some time to get used to Cordelia's body. As one might expect, the armor felt pretty strong, but also light. Probably ideal for a pegasus knight. Of course, kind of like the others, Cordelia's boots sported some heels, which James was trying to get himself used to right now. You also found a brave lance (the same lance in Cordelia's artwork) nearby and gave it to James. He was trying it out a bit, with some difficulty.

"This thing isn't light." panted James, tucking his lond hair behind his ear. "And how does she fight with all this hair anyway?"

"It doesn't look that bad. Could be worse." you said nonchalantly. James groaned at you in response. Turning away from James for a minute, you noticed something in the back. There seemed to be a machine. It wasn't too big, but probably around your size at least. There seemed to be some container that could probably one of you in there as well.

"Hey James, quit hurting yourself and get over here!" you yell over at James. He had just missteped and landed on his butt, getting up gingerly.

"Ow." he groaned as he walked over.

"You know, you keep that up and you might give Sumia a run for her money." you grinned at James.

"Shut up." he retorted. After that, you both took a look at the machine, neither of you knowing what it was.

"Hey, how about we set something and get in there?" you asked James.

"Are you nuts? What if it kills you or something?" James spat out. You rolled your eyes again.

"I guess giving you Cordelia's body was perfect after all. You're a real worrywort, just like her." you began to laugh, making James pout.

"Fine, but don't cry to me if something goes bad." said James. Nodding, you looked at the screen. There seemed to be a default setting, with the screen asking for a "Yes" or"No" answer to "Go in?".

"Go into what?" James asked.

"Let's find out." you said, clicking "Yes" on the screen. The next command was "Please step inside containment unit", to which the pod behind the screen opened up. You immediately walked to it.

"You'll get me out if things go wrong right?" you asked.

"Yeah, sure." said James, rolling his eyes, which actually looked kind of cute on Cordelia's face. Anyway, the doors soon closed. James kept a close eye on the screen, and watched commands pop up.

"Sequence initiated. Begin transfer." came up on the screen.

"Transfer? Transfer where?" asked James. Just as he was starting to worry, he heard the machine roar to life and a bright light engulfed him. It must have stayed that way for a minute or so, until the light dimmed down, allowing James to get back up.

"W-What was that?" he stumbled a bit. Looking over, he saw the pod die down and reopen. You were no longer in there.

"Anthony?!" Hello?!" James called out, but no reply. "Oh man, where did he go? Should I follow him?" James asked himself.

Part of him was worried about getting into a lot of trouble, but James didn't want to leave you behind. Deciding that it was worth it, James repeated the commands and got in himself.

"Boy, I hope this isn't a huge mistake." said James as he closed his eyes, braced himself, and found himself engulfed by light again.
12433111211.title: Looking around more

124331112111.content: Where does James end up?
124331112111.title: Following James

1243311121111.content:
James couldn't tell what was going on. His mind felt foggy, and he couldn't see at all. He remembered a bright light engulfing him and Anthony, but that seemed to be all. As he was wondering about this, he began to hear a faint voice, and it slowly got louder and louder.

"Who is being so loud?" he thought.

"Cordelia!!" the voice practically screamed at him. The shock seemed to get James' eyes to open, immediately being exposed to a searing sunlight.

"Ugh....what?" James said meekly. However, he looked up and saw a young man with blue hair standing over him. It barely took a second for James to see who it was. It was Chrom, the main character of Fire Emblem Awakening.

"What?!" James then almost screamed out, getting him to sit up. Feeling something weird on him, he looked down, seeing himself in a red Pegasus Knight uniform. He remembered going into Cordelia's body a while ago, but the last few moments were all foggy.

"Are you alright? You took quite a hit there." said Chrom, offering a hand to James. James was still stunned silent but he accepted the hand and got to his feet, stumbling a big on his heeled boots.

"I....I think I'm fine..What happened?" asked James, looking around. He was in some kind of valley, with other members of Chrom's army scattered about.

"You fainted. After we defeated the enemy, you passed out on the ground. I think the shock of what happened was too much for you." said Chrom, a sympathetic smile on his face. James shook his head a bit, trying to get any cobwebs out.

"O-Oh, I see." he said slowly. Was he in the game now? Was that what that machine was for? If he had to guess, this place looked similar to Chapter 7: Incursion, when Cordelia first appeared. If that was the case, then he just came in after the battle was over.

"I'm actually in Ylisse?! Holy cow!" thought James, not sure whether to be excited or scared. With that in mind, he looked down and saw his Brave Lance at his feet, so he picked that off the ground. He could even spot Cordelia's pegasus a ways away, getting tended to.

"So what happened after I passed out?" asked James.

"Well, Emmeryn has gone back to Ylisse. We're to head back to Regna Farox to request reinforcements." said Chrom.

"So it is right after the battle." thought James. He tried to compose himself a bit. He now knew where he was and what was going on. Of course, looking around, he couldn't see Anthony anywhere. If he was Cordelia here, then Anthony had to be Lucina.

"If he's here too, I wonder what he's up too." thought James. With that, he turned to Chrom, his Brave Lance still in hand.

"Well, do you when we're leaving? Regna Farox is a long ways away." said James, trying to be in character. Cordelia was known for being very efficient in her work and always on top of things. He didn't want anyone to find him weird. Chrom gave him a small smile.

"Very soon. Just about ready to go. Make sure you're ready, although I imagine that won't be a problem." said Chrom. James gave a sheepish smile.

"Oh....yeah. No problem." he said, sighing after Chrom left him to himself.

He just entered a war zone in Ylisse, and as a woman on top of that. Was there a way back? Could he really die here?" The thought chilled James to the core. He could only hope that those fears wouldn't come to pass. He began walking, getting more used to the heels, and approached Cordelia's pegasus. James didn't have much experience with any animals, but he tried what he hoped would be best. He tried to pet the mount, which responded by rubbing against him.

"Heh, well that wasn't too hard." James smiled. Things could be looking up if this was any indication. Although, he didn't even know the mount's name, which could be a problem. However, right at that moment, a sudden voice made him a few feet.

"Oh hi Cordelia! Are you feeling better?" said a chipper female voice. James turned around and saw Sumia behind him. Sumia was another Pegasus Knight, although known more for clumsiness than skill. However, she was great with animals.

"Oh....uh, hi." said James, still reeling from her sudden introduction.

"Khan looks happy to see that you're okay. He got quite fussy when you collapsed." said Sumia. James nodded at what apparently was the pegasus's name, thankful to know what it was.

"Oh, well I'm sure." said James.

About a minute later, he heard Chrom's voice.

"All right, time to move out! We head for Regna Farox immediately!" commanded Chrom.

And with that, the journey was under way.
1243311121111.title: After Chapter 7: Incursion

12433111211111.content:
With Emmeryn believed to be safe in Ylisstol, James marched with Chrom's army towards Regna Ferox, the largest nation on the continent of Ylisse and ruled by the two Khans, Basilio and Flavia, with Flavia currently the full ruler. James didn't know what to expect from suddenly going from an average guy to a soldier in the army. The distance to Regna Ferox wasn't short, and the nation was generally pretty cold on top of that. As they were marching along, James could swear her legs felt like jelly.

"You all right?" Sumia, who was walking alongside James, asked in concern. Sumia had stuck by James' side, being the friend she was. James was happy for the company, as it allowed her some ease despite having to be another person entirely.

"Oh, I'm okay." James replied, trying to smile.

"Oh, that's good. I remember how you told me that you're a lousy runner, so I wanted to be sure." Sumia said. James flinched as she remembered Cordelia saying that she became a pegasus knight because she was a lousy runner. James almost blushed at the thought.

"This isn't too bad. I just need to get used to it." James said in her defense. Sumia smiled and nodded. Then, she seemed to have some sort of inspiration and drew James close to her.

"You know, you should talk to Chrom when you get the chance." said Sumia. James went as red as her uniform at the thought. She remembered that Cordelia didn't have any conversations with Chrom in the game, no supports or anything (outside one in a DLC). Obviously, it was due to her shyness and inability to put her feelings into words

"Why do you say that?" James asked.

"You've gone through so much, and I think he could help you." Sumia replied.

"Well, I guess that's true." James conceded, saying it kind of slowly.

"Looks like he's busy with Anthony right now. Perhaps you can talk with him tonight when we set up camp. I know you'll probably be the first one all set up." Sumia said with a smile. James went red again at the compliment as she looked towards Chrom upon hearing Anthony's name, only to see the Avatar that most resembled her friend.

"Thanks." She said softly, while wondering about the connection between the group's tactician and her friend. Man, was it weird having to deal with a woman's body like this. It was one of the reasons why James hadn't talked to anyone other than Sumia since they started marching.

*****Later that day (at camp)*****

Chrom had decided to set up camp near the highroad as the sun began to set. Many were relieved to get some rest, although some still had energy to burn, like Sully. Another Shepherd, Stahl, ended up having to keep her restrained. As they set up camp, as Sumia actually predicted, James had her part of the camp all set up very quickly. It felt like a blur to her, like something came out from inside her and guided her body. It felt weird, yet good at the same time.

"Maybe it's some natural instinct of her body or something." She thought to herself. Having Cordelia's sense of responsibility could come in handy. However, she kind of dreaded having to go through with Sumia's suggestion of talking with Chrom. Not just because of Cordelia's shyness to talk to him, but partially because of her own to talk to the commander of an army.

"Well, I guess there's no time like the present though." She said, leaving her supplies all ready to go and trying to find Chrom.

12433121.content:
You find the Fire Emblem section after some searching, and you see several suits, divided by the games they come from. You go to the Awakening set of suits, and you happen to spot a particular suit, that of a certain black haired woman who you know well, Tharja. Tharja is all around darker in every way than any non-Henry character who can be recruited into Chrom's army, and originally joined Chrom's army because she didn't care one way or the other about the conflict between Plegia and Ylisse, and she was angry at being ordered by the king of Plegia to kill all the Ylissean people who were attempting to rescue Emmeryn. Shortly after, she had a dream where the Avatar took advantage of her body and promised to marry her, and in her warped mind, she decided to hold the real Avatar to it (this was only revealed in Japanese media) and fell for him, and began stalking him, doing everything in her power to try to win his heart, along with it being heavily implied that she wanted him to do in real life what his dream self did. You decide that you want to become her, and wonder how she'd react to that thought.

You undress and pick up the Tharja suit. Even deflated, you can clearly see the assets that gave her the title of "the one with the best body" in the Japanese version. You turn it to face away from you and pull the opening open wide. You place your right leg inside her right leg, expecting resistance due to size difference, only to find that your foot slips in as easily as putting on a glove, as well as feeling like that part of the suit really is your skin. You quickly slip your left leg in, and pull the suit up to your waist. You note an emptiness at your crotch where your penis usually is as you put your arms in, and pull it up to your chest, attaching Tharja's breasts to your chest, which causes them to inflate to full size. You give a quick squeeze, and feel a moistness down below, before shaking your head and getting back on track. You grab the head of the suit, and plung your head in, arranging your facial features to line up with Tharja's. Upon completing this task, you find that you don't seem to be looking out of the eyeholes of a mask. You turn your head quickly, whipping your new hair into your face. You take your dainty new hand, and move the hair out of the way, then you stare at it in amazement, before finding a mirror and looking in. The Tharja in the mirror looks back at you with an amazed look on her face. You give a wide grin, which looks odd on Tharja's face, so you shift it to one of Tharja's smirks as you put a hand on your hip. You start to play arround with expressions and poses, before taking note of how chilly the air is on your naked skin. You go over to the outfits, and you see several different ones, ones for each of the outfits she can class change into (including the Bride class's wedding dress), but decide to put on Tharja's default Dark Mage outfit, The skintight bodysuit goes on easily enough, all things considered, and you follow with everything that goes overtop of it. After securing the cloak/cape, you pick up the headrest and put it on. You pick up a random Dark Magic tome to complete the look, and head back to the mirror. You do a quick twirl, followed up by Tharja's giggle just for the heck of it, before bursting out laughing. As you calm down, you consider what to do.

What do you do?

124331211.content:
You wonder what to do for a few more minutes before an idea pops into your head. Seeing as you are now Tharja, why not see what it's like being her? You wonder what it would like to take a backseat inside Tharja's head and try to figure out, when suddenly, you feel dizzy. You grip your head as a feeling of vertigo overwhelms you. You try to reach out and cling to a nearby the shelf, but soon find your legs have gone numb. And upon falling to the floor you black out.

...

You awake to find yourself standing upright. You try to look around, but find you are not in control of your body. You see that you are in a tent of some sort. Before you stands a man with dark brown hair who is clad in cyan blue colored armor.

"You can't get strong if you don't train, Tharja. Here, let's try thirty jumping jacks, followed by forty curl ups." The man says.

"F-forty? Are you insane?" You grumble in a low tone, before mumbling about him being an idiot for expecting a Mage to be as physically strong as people who don't use magic.

'Wait what?! I didn't mean to say that!' You think, but are unable to express it in any way, but regardless, your body continues to act on its own.

"Now, now, Tharja, you must be fit if you want to be useful in a fight." The man who you now recognize as none other than the over protective knight Fredrick says.

'Wait if that's Fredrick, and he's talking to Tharja...oh crap!' You mentally gulp upon the realization. 'How the heck did I get here? I just...ugh I think I'm gonna be sick.'

You pass out, not yet realizing that you are just expriencing Tharja's memories first hand instead of actually doing this right now, and later awaken to find...

124331221222221.content:
"Unreal." you said as you slowly walked through the creepy warehouse.

There were rows upon rows of suits, seemingly ranging from any kind of fiction. This began to make you wonder if you could find suits from one of your favorite series. That would be Fire Emblem.

"Hmm, would they have those here?" you wondered out loud.

Looking through the rows, you were delighted to find exactly what you were looking for: a Fire Emblem section. There were so many, a s you would expect from such a series. Looking through some all, one caught your attention. It was a bit hard to tell with the suits being naked not having complete faces, but there was one with blonde hair that you recognized. It was Lissa from Fire Emblem: Awakening, and one of your favorite characters in the game.

"Well, maybe I should...." you pondered to yourself. This whole thing was kind of wierd. Why would you try on a suit from his wierd place and all? Then again, you had a certain curiosity about these kinds of things. With that in mind, you went and stripped off your regular clothes, feeling a little cool from the slight chill. Thinking quickly, you tried to put the suit on.

"Wait, isn't she smaller than me?" you asked yourself. However, the legging you put your leg in seemed to fit your leg perfectly somehow. Feeling a little weird, you took it as a sign to keep going, and you put your legs and arms into the suit. Adjusting your head into the suit, you were able to grab the zipper and zip it up to your neck.

Once you did, a discomforting squeeze covered your body, making you wince and hold yourself as you felt yoru body being shifted in numerous places. You could feel an emptiness forming in your groin area as well as most of your body thinning out and small orbs inflating on your chest.

After a minute, the discomforting squeezing stopped, and you collapsed to the ground, slightly exhausted.

"What the..." you started before gasping and bring your hands to your mouth. Your voice was pretty different now, and you felt long blonde hair at your back.

"Wait, did I just..." you trailed off again, realizing that your body just became Lissa's entirely.

However, before you could think further, the slight chill made you shiver again. You knew that you didn't want to catch a cold in this dank place, so you looked back at the shelf and found Lissa's default Cleric gear. You quickly grabbed it and tried to put it on, although the metal garment that went under the dress felt weird. Still, you got it on, even putting on her headdress and arranging your hair in Lissa's signature ponytails.
124331221222221.title: Yes

1243312212222211.content:
Now that you finally got yourself at least some warmth, you had the chance to look yourself over. The full impact of now being in Lissa's body hit you, with your mind still trying to accept it.

"I can't believe I actually look like this now." you spoke, noticing how Lissa's voice now came out of your mouth.

Of course, another question soon came. What to do now? You likely weren't going to go outside like this, so that was out of the question. However, there wasn't much else to do inside the warehouse either. What to do. What to do.

Then suddenly, you saw some flickering lights down another hall of the warehouse, coming from some kind of machine that you didn't recognize at all.

"What is something like that doing here?" you asked yourself.

You walked over, seeing the computer screen in front of you. Behind it, you could see some kind of containment unit, likely meant for someone to go into. You pressed something on the screen, instantly getting a "Transfer?" option.

"What does that mean?" you asked yourself. However, before much else happened, you ended up pressing "Yes".

"Transfer started. Please enter containment." appeared on the screen. At that, you saw the containment unit open, allowing you access. You looked inside, wanting to see what was up about it. However, before you could get out again, the door closed.

"What? Hey, what gives?!" you cried out, banging on the doors again. However, they wouldn't open, and you saw a countdown.

"Transfer in 3......2........1.......Start!"

Instantly, everything around you went white, and you quickly passed out, not knowing what was happening to you.
1243312212222211.title: An Unexpected Development

12433122122222111.content:
You had no idea how long it felt since you blacked out, but something definitely felt odd as you began to stir a bit. You felt a chill wind around you, although it wasn't as nippy as before. Not only that, but you felt warm rays of sunshine bearing down on you. Your eyes slowly stirred open, seeing a clear sunlit sky above you.

"Huh? Is it morning already?" you asked yourself. You got an answer soon enough.

"Hey, Lissa! Time to wake up!"

You immediately jumped at the call, seeing that you were just laying in a field, specifically around a campsite. You could see what remained off a campfire just smoldering a little bit away from you. You gave a confused look. Where were you right now? And why were you just referred to as Lissa? Surely this was still just a costume right?

"Lissa, are you alright?"

You heard the voice to your left and turned, gasping as you did. Standing right there was Chrom, Prince of Ylisse. Looking down, you were definitely still in the Lissa costume, and he was referring to you as such. But how did this happen? You were just in a warehouse just a while ago.

"Um...." you muttered, your brain all confused right now. Chrom gave a look of concern.

"I guess last night must have affected you a little more than I thought. I apologize." said Chrom.

"Huh, for what?" you asked.

"Don't you remember last night? We were attacked by those strange soldiers and that Marth fellow saved us."

You remembered how familiar that sounded. Awakening's Chapter 2 revolved around Risen appearing and "Marth" saving Lissa from one of them. Slowly, the gears in your head were turning. Whatever odd reality this was, you were somehow stuck just after Awakening's Chapter 2.

"Oh, uh, yeah. Yeah I remember that. Heh heh." You tried whatever you could think of to get Chrom off your case. "I, uh, guess I'm still half-asleep."

Chrom actually gave a sincere smile at those words.

"Well, that's good then. I'd hate to see what Emm would think if I brought back traumatized. You are the delicate one after all." he said, which seemed to ignite something inside you.

"I am not delicate!" you almost yelled, which surprised you. Where did that come from? Lissa had a line like that, and the way Chrom said it somehow forced that out of you.

"Right." smiled Chrom while rubbing the top of your head a bit. "Well, Frederick and Anthony are all set. We should get going to Ylisstol. We still have to tell Emm about those weird soldiers, as well as the Plegian bandits."

Helping yourself to your feet, you saw Lissa's Heal staff to your side and picked it up. Problem is, you had no idea how to use it. How does one use a Heal staff anyway? Not only that, if you had no idea, the others might get suspicious.

And wait, did he just say Anthony?

"But I'm Anthony." you muttered to yourself. "Unless this world somehow modeled the Avatar after me."

Walking back with Chrom, what you imagined was true after all. The Avatar of this world was indeed modeled somewhat after your real world form. So now, for some reason, you were stuck as a Princess of Ylisse, and a healer on top of it.

"Oh boy."

12511221.content:
"I always did like you, Paine." ou say to no one in particular as you lightly touch the suit, having found yourself drawn to it out of all the others. You've always had a bit of a thing for the 'punk rocker chick' look she rocks. And you do rather enjoy her dry, sarcastic humor. You pick the suit up; the artificial skin is not warm to touch, but holds a lifelike texture to it. The thing is deflated, but even like that you can make out its defined feminine curves, nicely toned muscles, and average-sized breasts.

Flipping it over, you can see an opening from the base of the neck to the pelvis. You're about to begin inserting yourself inside, but catch yourself when you realize that you're still dressed. "Whoops." You mutter quickly, before shedding yourself fully. You start entering the suit again, this time in your birthday suit. As you slip your feet into the suit's and wiggle your toes, you're amazed at its elasticity -you're a good couple of inches taller than Paine, yet the suit stretches easily to accommodate your frame, though it is a squeeze. It takes some effort, but you're able to fit your limbs in the corresponding holes of the suit. You inspect your new body, which has been increasingly less uncomfortable as time passes. (Maybe this was just you talking crazy, but you're think the suit's beginning to shrink your body, little by little.)

"And for my finishing trick, I'll make Anthony disappear." You remark jokingly to no one in particular, looking at the vacant, fake-skin sac that is Paine's head; the final part of the suit. Taking a deep breath, you plunge your head into Paine's. You make sure everything's aligned: nose to nose, mouth to mouth, eyes to eyes, ears to ears.

You stand up tall to look in the mirror, inadvertently closing the seam. You suddenly feel an enormous pressure begin to weigh down on you from all sides. Your body is changing, rapidly morphing into something different as your flesh is pinched and molded like clay. A hot and pleasurable feeling erupts from your core, and suddenly you feel naked again. Your eyes blink open. You walk towards the mirror a few feet away and inspect yourself. You gasp, and a female voice exits your lips.

There, staring back at you from the mirror with a wide-eyed expression that is no doubt on your face is well, is Paine. Quickly composing yourself, you smirk -just as the real Paine would- and quip in her voice, "Ta-da!" Hearing her voice come from your mouth, her saying what you want her to say... a shiver of pleasure runs through your body. For all intents and purposes, Paine is yours. You can make her do and say whatever you want...

"So, are you just gonna sit here drooling over me?" The Paine in the mirror asks, no small amount of sarcasm in her voice. Though it's really you who says it, providing her with life, animating her like a puppet. "Some clothes would be nice." The silver-haired woman in the mirror frowns, resting a hand on her hip and shifting her weight to one leg. This, too, has been you pretending, and though you make a good point, the prospect of self-pleasure while role-playing finds itself very erotic to you. On the other hand, you're also eager to see Paine in her full getup, and the cool air of the warehouse nips at your new skin.
