Of course, Kairi is a bit shorter than you, so you wouldn't normally be able to fit in this thing. However, as you place your right leg in the suit, it slips right in like it is meant to be there. You proceed to place your left leg in and the same thing occurs. "This is strange." You say to yourself. Anyway, you slip the top half on. It stretches like elastic. Although, it didn't feel like anything you've had before. It's almost like... it's a part of your or something.

Anyway, you shake it off and fit your arms through their sockets and quickly put everything in place. Almost immediately, you stop right there. It's like you were actually a girl. 1252121.content:
Instantly, you scream, although it comes out in a female voice. You see a naked Kairi in the mirror do the same. You slowly raise your right arm and the reflection does the same. You grab your now long red hair and, again, the reflection does the same. That was you! "It really is me." You say in Kairi's voice now.

After getting over the revelation that you are now a girl, you decide to....
1252121.title: you scream

12521211.content:
You decide that it might be best to get dressed now. It isn't exactly warm being naked in the warehouse. Looking where you got the Kairi suit, you find her pink outfit, along with underwear, of course. The bra and panties are both white. You pull the panties up your legs and rest them at your groin. The bra takes a few minutes but you eventually get it hooked on correctly.

"I will never understand how girls deal with these things." You grumble to yourself. Next, you grab Kairi's white halter top and pull it over your head. It feels kind of tight against your body. Next, comes the mini dress. You bring it over your head and pull it down, placing your head through the opening which also contains a hood. The dress has three zippers on it although two appear to be decorative. The other, which goes right down the middle is zipped up from the botton up to under your breasts. Next, come the lilac shoes. You pick them up and slip them on your feet. You realize that appeantly people don't wear socks in the Kingdom Hearts series so, like Kairi, you wrap the shoelaces around your ankles. Then, you grab a black belt with some kind of book holder on the left side and put on. Next, you pick up Kairi's blue, black, and white bracelets and place them on your left wrist. To top it off, you find Kairi's necklace and put it on as well. Looking back at the mirror, you see Kairi's complete reflection staring back at you.

What happens next?
12521211.title: get dressed

125212111.content:
Suddenly, there on the floor, you find Kairi's lucky charm. She gives this to Sora in hope that he will return to her. "How romantic." You say to yourself with slight sarcasm. The charm is made out of thalassa shells and looks like Sora on the top. You pick it up and place it in your pocket for safe keeping.

After doing that, something catches your eye; some sort of device in a corner of the warehouse. "What is that?" You wonder as you walk over to it. You see that it is about the same height as an average human, with what looks like a laser on it.. "What is this?" You wonder out loud, not knowing what it was. You decide to re-read the note. Maybe it can tell you what it is. You run back to the note and pick it up. You read it over to find out about any devices. Eventually, you find it, "Ah-ha" you say. The note says:

There is also a device that, when used, can imprint the suit that someone is wearing as that person's normal body. The result is the user becoming the character while their prevous form becomes a new suit in its place.

So, this device can make Kairi your actual body and turn your 'Anthony form' into a suit. The thought is intriguing. However, should you do it?
125212111.title: you find her lucky charm

1252121111.content:
"Yeah, I'll do it." You say to yourself as you decide to imprint the Kairi suit you are wearing and make it your real body. Operating the machine you set it to imprint the suit and stand in front of the laser. It fires a beam, which gives you a weird feeling when it connects with you. "Did it work?" You wonder. Soon enough, you get your answer.

There, laying in a compartment on the device, is a suit that looks like a naked version of you with your clothes beside it. You begin to feel your body, and try making the opening appear just to see if you can, and nothing happens. Kairi's body is yours now. It seems kind of strange actually. You place the Anthony suit and the clothes where the Kairi suit originally was.

With that done, you decide to...
1252121111.title: Anthony's new body: Kairi

12521211111.content:
You decide to read the note again to make sure you didn't forget anything. You find out that you can access Kairi's memories at anytime. You can also even put Kairi's personality in control if you wanted to (while still able to make them do whatever you want. You made sure to remember this information. You even decided to try out the memory thing, You focused for a bit and, indeed, you could access Kairi's memories. Everything was there, everything that happened during Kingdom Hearts and Kingdom Hearts II as well as everything between and before that she has memories of, from her point of view.

What do you do now?
12521211111.title: read the note again

125212111111.content:
Now that you are Kairi, you decide to try to go into the game world. "Now, how do I get there?" You wonder in confusion. Suddenly, you see another message on the note. It explains about the main computer and all that it can do. You go to the computer, punch in the info, then get into a pod nearby.

Which point in the series did you choose to go to?
125212111111.title: go into the series

1252121111112.content: How about the beginning of Kingdo Hearts II?
1252121111112.title: start of Kingdom Hearts II?

choices: You hear someone calling for you
12521211112.title: something else happens

choices: Test out what your body can do
Try to calm down, and take in that the note was real after all
12522.content:
Looking through the Kingdom Hearts section, you come across a suit for Xion. Since playing 358/2 Days, she was one of your favorite characters. You were greatly saddened when she was killed at the end (especially because you thought there might have been something between her and Roxas), and you were really happy that she was brought back in Kingdom Hearts 3. Not only that, she was really cute. She wasn't exactly the sexy type; she was just cute, but that was good enough for you. You weren't sure if you believed the note, but you wanted to cosplay as Xion. With no hesistation, you take the naked Xion suit off of the shelf and wonder how your put it on. Finally, you see an opening in the back. With that, you take your clothes off, leaving yourself naked. You have to admit that it felt wierd putting on a naked girl's suit. Anyway, you open up the suit, and begin to step in it.

Of course, Xion is shorter than you, so you wouldn't normally be able to fit in this thing. However, as you place your right leg in the suit, it slips right in like it was meant to be there. Your leg feels tingly as it enters the suit. Anyway, you shake that off and continue on. You think that it's just apprehention or something like that. You proceed to place your left leg in and the same thing occurs. "This is strange." You say to yourself. Anyway, you slip the top half on. It stretches like elastic. Although, it doesn't feel like anything you've put on before. It's almost like... it's a part of you or something.

Anyway, you shake it off and fit your arms through their sockets and quickly put everything in place. You stop almost immediately. It's like you are actually a girl. For some reason, you feel an emptiness in your lower area and a weight on the upper area. Both are things that weren't there before.

You look around for a mirror, and upon finding one, look in to discover that your manhood is gone. It's been replaced with a girl's vagina.
12522.title: Xion

choices: Get dressed in her Organization XIII Cloak
Get dressed in her casual clothes from the end of Kingdom Hearts 3

After getting over the revelation that you are now a girl, you decide to....

You pull the underwear up your legs and rest them at your groin. The bra takes a few minutes but you eventually get it hooked on correctly.

"I will never understand how girls deal with these things." You grumble to yourself. Next, you pull on the skin-tight black pants, which hug your curves. Next, comes the boots. You slip both on, taking a minute to get used to the heels. Next, comes the cloak itself. You pick it up and bring it around your body. 'It's kind of wierd that they wear these coats with almost nothing underneath.' You think to yourself. Anyway, you place your arms through the sleeves and zip it up, as high as it can go and down to above the thighs. To finish it, you put on the black gloves. Looking back at the mirror, you see Xion's complete reflection staring back at you.

What happens next?

You remember that Xion uses a keyblade. Looking at the shelf, you find just what you are looking for; the Kingdom Key. You pick it up and discover how light it is. "Seems easy enough to use." You say out loud as you take a few practice swings.

You spend about 5-10 minutes practicing with the keyblade. For an oversized key, it's pretty fun to use. As you are practicing, you spot a device in a corner of the warehouse. "What is that?" You wonder as you walk over to it, dispelling your keyblade as you do. You see that it is about the same height as an average human, with what looks like a laser on it.. "What is this?" There is also a device that, when used, can imprint the suit that someone is wearing as that person's normal body. The result is the user becoming the character while their prevous form becomes a new suit in its place.

So, this device can make Xion your actual body and turn your 'Anthony form' into a suit. The thought was intriguing. However, should you do it?

There, laying in a compartment on the device, is a suit that looks like a naked version of you with your clothes beside it. Now that you are Xion, you decide to try to go into the game world. "Now, how do I get there?" You wonder in confusion. Suddenly, you see another message on the note. It explains about the main computer and all that it can do. You go to the computer, punch in the info, then get into a pod nearby.

Which point in the series did you choose to go to?
12522111111.title: go into the series

125221111111.content: "It would be nice to experience this from the beginning" you say to yourself. You have chosen to start at the very beginning (in other words, the start of 358/2 Days). All of a sudden, you hear a noise coming from the machine, signaling that it is working. The noise overwhelms you and suddenly you see a great flash. This causes you to pass out as you disappeared from this world.
125221111111.title: very beginning

1252211111111.content: Where do you end up waking up?
1252211111111.title: Xion's beginning

12522111111111.content:
You can see nothing but black for who knows how long. Suddenly, you can feel some kind of light. Slowly, you open your eyes. It takes a while to open them because there is a really bright light in your face.

"At last, you awaken." A mysterious voice says.

'Who said that?' You think to yourself. You feel like you just woken up from a very, VERY, long sleep and you feel very groggy. If you weren't, you could identify it.

You try to look around and see that you're in a room with white walls. In fact, the whole room is white. In fact, it kind of looks like...'Castle Oblivion' You finally realize. With that in mind, you look to your right to see the source of the voice. It is a tall man with long blonde hair and a black coat. 'Vexen!' You think, knowing who he is.

You can also see that you have just come out of some pod-like contraption. The fact that you are in Castle Oblivion with Vexen here could only mean one thing: This is when Xion was created, and right before she joined the Organization.

'So this is when Xion was made.' You think. Now, you wonder how to proceed from here on. Since this isn't in the game, you have no idea about what is supposed to happen. Then, you remember that you can put Xion's personality in charge for a bit so no one gets suspiscious. After all, there is no danger of you completely losing yourself.

What should you do?
12522111111111.title: Castle Oblivion

125221111111111.content:
You decide that you should put Xion in control for a bit so you don't seem suspiscious. You focus and close your eyes and let her personality show itself. It's an odd feeling. You still have control of your body, and yet, at the same time, you don't.

Suddenly, you start slowly looking around the room like some newborn baby. No words seem to come out of your mouth.

"Can you speak?" Vexen asks as he comes over to you. You know that this personality at this time can't, as you know that Xion first speaks when she's with Roxas. You just look at Vexen strangely.

"I guess you can't yet. Oh well, that'll come in time." The Chilly Academic says. Then, he continues. "The first of the new Replica Program, No.i. Your name shall be... Xion."

Meanwhile, you take a look at what you are wearing. It seems that even at this time you are wearing Xion's black cloak, which is good. You certainly don't want Vexen looking at your naked body.

Is today also the day that Xion is introduced to the rest of the Organization?
125221111111111.title: put Xion's personality in control

1252211111111111.content:
"All right, time for some tests." Vexen says. You have your hood up by the way.

'Oh great, what could he mean by tests?" You think, but keep Xion in charge.

About an hour passes. You actually don't do much. Mostly, Vexen just hovers around you, checking to see if you are functional or something. Then, he enters things into a computer.

"All right, that's enough. It's time to introduce you to the rest of the Organization." He says as he roughthly grabs your arm.

'He could be a bit more gentle.' You scold in your mind. Vexen summons a Corridor of Darkness.

"Proceed through it. Wait until you are called to proceed further." Vexen says as he summons a second corridor and walks thorugh it, after which it vanishes.

'Well, here goes nothing.' You think as you walk to the corridor and walk through it. It's a strange feeling, walking through darkness, but you don't feel any problems.

A few seconds later, you walk through the exit of the corridor and it vanishes behind you. 'So, now I have to wait. Great.' You think as you look around, your hood still on. It looks like a small passageway and immediately in front of you is Where Nothing Gathers, the meeting place of the Organization.

About half an hour passes, you pass the time by just thinking of whatever you can. 'Anytime now.' You think.

Suddenly, you hear a booming voice. "Good tiding friends. Today is a momentous day." You hear someone announce. You can tell that it is Xemnas, leader of the Organization. "I am pleased to announce that a new comrade has been chosen to wear our cloak." He continues. That's your cue so you begin to walk into open view. The room looks just like it does in the games, with it's 13 towering 'seats'. You walk to the middle of the floor and stop there. "Number XIV." Xemnas announces. At that, you look up, seeing all of the Organization members. Xemnas, Xigbar, Xaldin, Vexen, Lexaeus, Zexion, Saix, Axel, Demyx, Marluxia, and Larxene. Continuing you see who you are looking for; Number XIII, Roxas.

'There he is. Thank goodness he doesn't always have that look on his face.' You think as you look in his direction. With Xion's personality in control, you smile at seeing Roxas. As predicted, he gasps a little and stares at you.

"Be sure to welcome our newest member. That is all." Xemnas says as he disappears into a dark corridor. Most of the other members warp out as well while you just stand there. Suddenly, Saix appears in front of you.

"Head to..."
1252211111111111.title: Meeting the Organization

12522111111111111.content:
"Head to the Grey Area. There, we will start on our missions." Saix says as he warps out. With your body still on autopilot, you summon a dark corridor and walk through it.

You appear a little bit outside the Grey Area so you have to walk a bit. On the way, you start thinking, 'When and what do they eat here? The only time I see them eat is when Roxas, Xion, and Axel have their ice cream. The games don't show any of that but they have to eat something.' Despite your questions, you decide to leave them for later.

Entering the Grey Area, where the Organization members meet for their missions, you wondered what your next move should be. 'Xion doesn't team up with Roxas for quite a few days. Should I really wait that long?' You wonder as you find a place to stand in the room.

Suddenly, who walks up to you?
12522111111111111.title: the Grey Area

125221111111111111.content: Suddenly, Roxas walks up to you. He just looks at you, as if he doesn't know what to say. 'That's right, he's still a 'zombie' at this time.' You think, inwardly laughing a bit at calling Roxas that. You wonder what Roxas wants to say as you look at him, while he still hasn't said anything.
125221111111111111.title: Roxas

1252211111111111111.content:
Eventually, Roxas is actually able to spit something out. "H-Hello." He says slowly.

'Wow, he actually got something out. Maybe I should take it from here on out. I'd like to do some things my way.' You think as you turn your head towards Roxas. You decide to keep Xion's personality on a little longer but now you decide to take charge of your body.

"....R-Roxas." You slowly say, hearing your new voice for the first time in this world. This gets Roxas' attention.

"Huh?" He says. You decide to continue talking like Xion does in the early parts of the game.

"Roxas... can I... call you that?" You ask really slowly. Roxas acts like he doesn't know what to do, until he eventually nods his head slowly.

"Y-Yes... you... can." He says just as slowly.

'This could take a while if we keep talking like this.' You think.

"What's... your... name?" Roxas asks.

"...Xion..." You reply after a bit. Roxas nods as if he understands. "Um...ok." He says. With that, he walks away to join Axel for his first mission.

What about you?
1252211111111111111.title: he eventually says something

12522111111111111111.content:
Suddenly, after Roxas and Axel leave, Saix comes up to you. "It's time to start your mission. As you just arrived here, this will just be a training mission. Make sure you learn well." He says. You just stare at him through your hood. "Demyx will be accompanying you as your tutor for this mission." Saix continues.

"Oh man!" You hear Demyx groan from the other side of the room. Inside, you laugh as his reaction.

"Now go." Saix finishes as he summons a dark corridor.

"Well, let's just get this over with." The Melodious Nocturne says as he approaches you, clearly bummed out that he can't lay around longer. He proceeds through the dark corridor and you follow him.

'Well, here it goes. My first mission here. I don't know how long I'll be here so I might as well get used to it." You think.

You end up going to....
12522111111111111111.title: mission time

125221111111111111111.content:
You and Demyx end up going to Twilight Town. You end up in a different place from where Roxas and Axel are though.

Shall we follow the mission or skip to the end?
125221111111111111111.title: Twilight Town

1252211111111111111112.content:
To say that the mission was boring would be an understatement. You kept Xion's personality in front, as to make sure that you didn't do anything you shouldn't. As you did that, you were in awe seeing Twilight Town in real life.

It was almost nothing like the game. Well, some areas were the same, yes. However, the place was so much bigger with places you never got to explore in the games. This awed you and made you smile on the inside.

However, as one can expect, the mission was simply a practice run, meant to show the ropes of how things go. It certainly didn't help that Demyx didn't even have half his heart into it, that is if he had one.

"Oh man, this is such a drag. I'm so glad that we're finally done and we can RTC already. Oh, that means 'Return To the Castle' by the way" groaned Demyx, as you and him were walking back to where you left the dark corridor.

'Sheesh, what an absolute complainer! Can't he whine in his head or something?' you said in your mind, your face remaining stoic as to keep the facade up. It felt wierd allowing your body to move on autopilot in a way, and yet be able to think clearly with no problem. Funny how that works out. You hoped that, soon enough, you might be used to it enough that you wouldn't need to keep Xion's personality in front, but rather be able to imitate it yourself.

Without another word, you and Demyx stepped through the corridor, the darkness having no effect on you thanks to the coat. You both emerged in the castle, the corridor closing behind you. It took you a second to realize that you never ate anything during the mission.

'Do nobodies really not need food or something?" you thought to yourself. You turned your head around a few times, trying to see if Roxas had returned yet. You didn't see him, but Xigbar noticed and walked over to you.

"Hey poppet, you looking for Roxas?" he asked, a sneer on his face as he did. You kept the stoic look up, seemingly not paying much attention to him. He chuckled in response.

"Well, you're kind of late. The kiddo already went to his room. Probably sleeping like a baby right now" snickered Xigbar. You really didn't like this guy. From a video gamer's perspective, he's an interesting character. Meeting face to face, he was a bit annoying.

Not saying a word, you started walking away from everyone, not in the mood to talk (even if you wanted to). Seeing that Roxas was probably already in bed, you figured you'd head to your room. Another thing came to mind, you didn't even know what time it was. Twilight Town doesn't exactly have a good sense of time.

"I'll never understand this place" you actually muttered to yourself. You were alone, hence why you put yourself in front for now. Your throat felt odd and your higher voice cracked a bit thanks to lack of use. You allowed a small smile at your situation. Soon enough, you found a room with your name on it, or Xion's anyway. Without another second, you walked in and closed the door.

"Phew, this will take getting used to" you said to yourself, allowing yourself at least some time to act normal. Demyx's session with you only covered basics, like treasures and barriers and such. Things like magic would probably come in the next few days.

You also supposed that your body was following the games' physics, at least for a while. Despite having the keyblade when you were at the warehouse, you found that you couldn't summon it right now. You assumed that your body would have to learn it at the appropriate time.

Having not much else to think about, you took your gloves and boots off and got into the bed, since you doubted that there were pajamas provided. As you started to go to sleep (putting Xion back in front just in case), you kept thinking about what you should do.

'Well, I'm not particularly fond of killing myself later on. Maybe I can change things for the better, so me and Roxas can stick around'
1252211111111111111112.title: End of Day 7

choices: Yes, he deserves it for what he does later...
No, allow him to get away with it for now at least...

Saix gives you an angry look as if staring at you like you had done somethign wrong though thsi early in the game you hadn't even been on a mission.

"Come with me puppet..."he ordered and then began to walk away from you, after a few more steps he stopped suddenlly and looked back at you "...I'm going to show you your room so come now!" HE ordered you around like that of a dictator thoguh you didn't exactly know why. Usually he's just a jerk to you but you shrug it of (mentally of course) and have Xion follow him. You wander the halls of Castle Oblivion for what seems like horus until you arrived at 'your room'.

You gripped yoru fist in anger as you began to remember what Saix ment and then remembered back a bit before you had found the factory, Saix was you compleate and totaly enemy for what he put Xion threw. 12531.title: Krystal?

...put off going into Adventures, and put on her Assault outfit
125311.content:
You waste no time in getting the Krystal suit down, and you look at it with anticipation. Krystal is your favorite female character in the series (not counting how she acts in Command, as it isn't canon), and you were upset when you found out that she was only playable for a short time in Adventures, due to Andross trapping her in, ironnically, a crystal.

You quickly strip down to nakedness, and begin to put the suit on. Your right leg easily fits into the right leg of the suit. You wiggle your toes, and see the it happening with the suit's toes, you also note that you feel as if you have fur growing from your right leg, not just being on your right leg, but growing from it. You put your left leg in, noting the same feelings as when you put your right leg in. You pulled the suit up to your groin, and then began to put your arms into the suit's arms, noting that you now feel an emptiness where your penis used to be. You soon have all of your body in the suit, with the exception of your head. You look behind you, seeing a tail attached to your behind, waving around casually, with no effort on your part, in fact, it feels so natural, that if you hadn't looked, you wouldn't have even noticed.

You reach back with your new right hand, and rub your new appendage, and sigh in content at the pleasurable feeling that goes throughout your body.

"No wonder fur coved animals loved to be rubbed." You muse. "That felt very good." With that final remark, you reach forward to grab the head of the suit, and you place your own head inside. You make sure that all of the facial features are aligned, and then you seal up the suit, the zipper disappearing in the process. You are now a naked Krystal. Of course, since you now have fur, you aren't the slightest bit cold, however, you want to see her in your favorite outfit of hers, the normal Starfox Assault outfit. You find it, and go to put it on, only to freeze in your tracks. You realize that if you're going to go into Starfox Adventures as you planned, there will be no point in wearing that outfit, as she wears a tribal kind of outfit in Adventures, so you'd be wearing that anyway. You're at a cross-roads, but you eventually decide to...

Krystal's Starfox Assault outfit: http://images.wikia.com/starfox/images/c...

1253112.content:
You are about to put the Assault outfit back and put on her Adventures outfit, when a thought crosses your head.

"Wait a minute; Randy said he really likes this series, maybe I'll show this to him." You think aloud. You quickly put on the Assault outfit, in addition to picking up Krystal's staff, and placing in its minimized form on your back like Fox does in Adventures, then you walk over to a full-body length mirror, stumbling a little due to the heels on the Assault outfit, combined with your new breasts, and look in it. You see Krystal looking back at you, a grin on her face matching one you've got on yours. "Now, I've got to do something about my balance problem, plus, if someone sees an anthro fox, let alone one from a video game, they'll freak out." You think for a moment, and then remember what the note said. You tap into Krystal's mind, using it to learn how to keep your balance in this body, you then walk over to the main computer and look up any possible ways of taking care of your remaining problem. You find that you can use the computer to alter reality so that people believe that you've always been Krystal. You alter reality so that everyone, with the exception of Randy, since that would defeat the purpose of showing him that you've become Krystal, believes that you have always been Krystal. You then walk out through the door, closing it behind you. Before going to Randy's, you decide to go back into your house to see the results of how things were changed. You get to your house, and go inside. Mia, your normally twin sister, but who is now a younger sister due to you having an 18 year old body, looks up and you and grins.

"Hey sis, you back from exploring?" She asks, not at all wondering why a female fox girl is inside her home, or even wondering how it is possible that the child of two humans is a humanoid fox in the first place.

"For now, at least." You reply. "I'm heading over to Randy's place soon, but I figured I'd stop by here first."

"Ok." She said before grinning. "Too bad you're a fox and not a wolf; he'd be trying to get a date with you in an instant if you were."

'Ok, so she realizes that I'm a fox, but doesn't think it's odd.' You think. You head to your room, and open the door. Inside, you find that things look pretty much the same, although slightly more girly, with jewelry on a stand in your room, and upon checking your drawers and closet, you find that your clothes have been adjusted to be worn by a girl of your new size and shape, along with female exclusive articles of clothing, such as bras, along with new outfits that you recognize as Krystal's, including copies of the one you are wearing now. You continue looking, and you see several skirts and dresses, and a closer look at your old clothes reveals that all of your clothes for special occasions where you have to dress fancier have been replaced by dresses of the same colors. While looking around, you see something that, if you were in an anime, would have caused you to sweat drop.

"What is with girls and shoes?" You mutter, quietly enough to avoid anyone possibly hearing you. You're comment was directed at the fact that you saw several shoes in your closet. There were several kinds, sneakers, high-heels, boots, both knee-high and normal (high-heeled or otherwise for both), sandals, you name it, and it was probably there.

You leave your room, and then exit your house. You walk down the street, passing several people, none of whom pay any attention to you, acting as if you are completely normal, even though normally they would be freaking out. You go to Randy's house, and knock on the door. The door opens, and you see Randy on the other side. His eyes go wide and he takes a step back.

"What the-" He begins, before you cover his mouth.

"Don't make a scene; I'll explain everything to you if you let me inside." You tell him. Randy nods and takes a step back. You walk in and close the door.

"Alright, how are you here? You're supposed to be a fictional character." Randy asks.

"It's me, Anthony." You reply. Randy rolls his eyes.

"Yeah right, like I'm gonna fall for..." He begins, only to pause in shock as you, after making the zipper appear, unzip it enough to get your head out, and thus, Randy sees your head on Krystal's body. "Anthony!? How!?"

"I found a warehouse full of suits of fictional girls." You begin. "Putting on a suit turns a guy into the girl he's wearing a suit of."

"So you chose Krystal." He says. You nod, pulling up the mask again, and re-zipping it.

"Yeah, and I came here to offer to let you try on a suit as well." You reply.

"Why me and not Frank?" Randy asks.

"Because you like Star Fox more." You reply. "We can go into the series of the girls we become, and I'd like you as back-up. Of course, you'd have to be Katt, since the other humanoid girls are non-canon, and I plan to go into Star Fox Adventures."

"I'm good with that." Randy replies. "Anything you need me to do before going to Sauria?"

"Yeah, find Falco, and convince him to go with you." You reply. He nods, and you both leave the house to go back to the warehouse.

"Wait how did you get here without a fuss?" Randy asks.

"There's a machine in the warehouse that alters reality, and I used it to make everyone but you believe that I was always Krystal." You reply. "Because of it seeming to be how I normally am to them, they can't realize something is wrong, even though I'm a completely different species. Mia didn't even think it was a little odd that I'm a fox, when my parents are humans." You get to the warehouse, and while he is putting on the Katt suit after getting undressed, you go and switch outfits, and then you go to the device that turns suits into the actual bodies of the ones wearing them. You place the newly created Anthony suit on a rack next to your normal clothes, which you had put away when getting undressed, right as Randy finishes getting dressed in Katt's clothes. "Alright, ready to go in?" You ask.

"Of course! Let's do this!" Randy replies, Katt's voice coming out of her mouth. You both go to the machine to bring you into the series and enter different pods.

1253321.title: The Main Character?

choices: Have some fun with your new body in the warehouse.
12533211.content:
You find one of the warehouse's computers. You examine the programs, and see that in addition to a more complete list of rules and instructions for using the warehouse and it's costumes, there are programs that can rearrange the order of the isles of costumes, search for which costume is in which isle as well as make new costumes of as-yet-unmade fictional girls, human or anthropomorphic versions of non-human video game girls, or even female versions of male video game characters.

You think about your friend Randy. Recently Randy had been playing though Okami, a game about Japanese mythology, in his free time. The protagonist was the sun goddess Amaterasu, taking the form of a wolf. You know Randy loves wolves, and loves the idea of becoming fictional girls. Putting the two together by making an anthropomorphic Amaterasu costume for him would probably make him the happiest guy on Earth.

You quickly enter a command to make such a costume. Within seconds, a large machine nearby begins to hum. You walk over to it just in time to see it place the costume on a shelf, along with a collection of foods, scrolls, pots of ink, holy mirrors, beads and swords. Suddenly a computerized voice rang through the factory.

"It is impossible to give the power of a god, so wearing the Amaterasu costume will only give you the power of a very strong spirit instead. We apologize for the inconvenience."

'Well, that's not a huge problem.' You think. 'After all, Amaterasu was cut down to that level in the game, so Randy should still be able to use her powers just fine.'

You look over the costume, admiring its beauty. "You know," You think out loud to yourself. "It wouldn't hurt to give it a try out myself." You head to the computer again, commanding it to freeze time until you leave the Warehouse. "Actually, it may be better if I try it on and show it to Randy. I mean, he might not believe me if I don't give him proof."

You remove your clothes, and grab the costume. You slip your legs inside, feeling them altering to stand in a digitigrade stance. As your waist slides into the suit, your penis vanishes with a strangely enjoyable feeling, as a fluffy white tail grows from your spine. As the suit covers you even more, you grow moderately sized breasts. Lastly, your head changes to that of a wolf, your ears pointy and your mouth and nose growing into a snout, with sharp teeth.

You feel a strong, distinct power within you, and to test it out, grab on of the blank scrolls and dip your tail in a pot of ink. Using it, you paint a picture of a seed dropping into the ground in front of you. When you stop and put the scroll down, you see just that scene unfold before you. Then the seed sprouts almost instantly into a tree.

Feeling satisfied with your abilities, but not wanting to leave a tree in the warehouse, you hold the scroll again, this time painting a sword slicing through the tree. When you put the scroll back down, the tree is suddenly sliced in half, and falls before fading away.

You look at the pot of ink, and see it is almost empty. You remember that the ink basically represented how much magic Amaterasu could use. It refilled gradually, but using too much of it at once would turn her mortal for a while. With this in mind, you decide that you'll limit how much you use your celestial paintbrush from now on.

You walk back over to the computer. It's bit harder to type with paws, but you manage. You find a set of controls to prevent people from making a big deal of some of the stranger costumes. Using these you manage to warp people's perceptions of you, making it so that nobody but Frank and Randy will think anything odd about a wolf girl running around town.

Now, will you head out to find Randy immediately, or do you have something to do here first?
12533211.title: The Beauty of Sunrise.

choices: After getting Mia, you lead her, Frank and Randy to the warehouse.
125332111.content:
Deciding that your fur does a good enough job of protecting you from the elements, and perverted eyes, you pick up an impressive sword, an ink pot, and a scroll, and decide to leave the warehouse in search of your friends.

Stepping outside, you head back through the quiet forest to your house. You figure that if your family recognizes the new you, everything will have worked as planned. You opened the back door and stepped through into the kitchen. You see your sister Mia eating a sandwich at the table.

"Oh. Hello Amaterasu." Mia says casually between bites.

So far, so good! You think. "Hello Mia. Notice anything different about me?" You ask, barely containing a giggle.

Mia looks you over, before noticing the sword on your back. "Oooh! Nice sword! How'd you get it? Where'd you find it?"

"I found it in a secret compartment in the woods, with a lot of other things." You laugh quietly. It's working perfectly! You think.

"A secret compartment!" Mia jumps up and down with glee. "Show me!"

"I will." You assure her. "But first, I want to show Randy my new toys. Do you where he might be?"

Mia strokes her chin in thought. "I think he and Frank went to the mall to get some video games, or something."

"Thanks Mia!" You say, running out the door before your sister has time to react.

With a wolf's body, you can easily run from your neighborhood to the city where Frank and Randy typically shop, without feeling tired in the slightest. When you reach the mall, you look back for a second and see that wherever you had ran, flowers had sprung up as if out of nowhere. Shrugging it off for now, you enter the mall.

Most people ignore you, as expected, but some children stop and stare at you. Slightly worried something might be wrong, you ask the kids "What are you looking at?"

"I was just wondering why you're wearing all that red makeup." A little girl comments. You remember that Amaterasu's markings and weapons could only be seen by children or those that believed in Japanese mythology. You were pretty sure you wouldn't have to worry about that last one.

"I found it in the woods." You say as you go on your way.

Finally, you reach Game-Stop, where you see Frank playing a demo of some game in the corner of the store, with Randy watching. With a grin on your face, you decide you'll have a little fun flirting with him to see how he'll react, before telling him about the warehouse.

"Hello there." You say in a low tone. "I heard one of you boys had a love for wolves?" Both boys turn around, their jaws dropping when they lay eyes on you.

"Y-yes..." Randy said, surprised and nervous. You're a bit taller than him as Amaterasu, plus you don't see naked wolf girls running around that often, so you can't really blame him for that reaction, though. "I do like wolves a lot." He paused. "You look kind of familiar.... Are you Amaterasu?"

You grin widely, very likely creeping Randy out, given your wider mouth's many sharp teeth. "I'm glad you recognize me Randy. Though I wish your friend Anthony had told me how handsome you are."

Frank stammered. "Anthony sent you to us?"

"Yes. I asked him where I could find a boy who loved wolves with all his heart," You dramatically declare, "as I have an amazing gift for such a boy." You strike a pose of holding out a gift. "So, are you interested, Randy?

With a look of elation on his face Randy nods. "Sure... Can Frank come along as well?"

"I don't see why not." You say, "I just might have something nice for him as well." You turn around. "Follow me! And try not to get left behind!" You say as you dash off.

"Right here." You reply.

1253322122121.content:
"Dang, what a place" you said to yourself. That didn't even begin to describe what you saw. Upon inspecting the many shelfs of suits, you discovered that they indeed were suits. It was kind of cool, yet also kind of creepy. There were suits of all kinds, from any series you could imagine. Naturally, being a video game lover, you decided to check out the video game section.

"So many to pick from. Whoever made this had a lot of free time" you chuckled to yourself. Eventually, you found yourself in the Mega Man section. Being curious about it, you took a look at the shelf. When you did that, your eyes were drawn to a certain duo of suits. Bringing your hand over one, you saw that this one was the suit of Maylu Sakurai, a character from the later Mega Man games. Looking over, you guess that the other suit was her NetNavi, Roll.

"Hmm, well I guess this could be interesting" you said as you brought the suit up. Maylu was 11 years, so naturally the suit would probably be incredibly small to someone like you. However, your curiosity was getting the best of you, so you decided to try it on. At that, you stripped your normal clothes on, feeling a little chilly from the cool night air. You certainly didn't want to be naked for long. With that in mind, you unzipped the zipper in the back and gently put one foot in, partly thinking that you're crazy.

However, the foot seemed to fit in like a glove, expanding a bit to fit you.

"Wierd" you say but you decide to continue. You place another foot in and the same thing happens. You put your arms through each sleeve and duck your head into the head part. You adjust it so your eyes and mouth are exposed and begin to pull the zipper up the back. Soon enough, you zipped it right up to the top of your neck.

As you did, a searing pain ripped through your body, causing you to grab yourself and fall to the ground. Itwasn't the worst feeling but it was enough for you to groan in discomfort. The skin felt like it was crawling, moving over your body. A particular pressure began to build in your chest and groin. Opening one eye, you gasped as the empty little breasts of the suit expanded, although not much given Maylu's age. However, a huge pressure built up in your groin, as if it was trying to push your manhood out of existance. A pressure also began building in your head, as if it was trying to take root in your skull as well.

Before long, it ended as quickly as it began. Panting in slight exhaustion, you slowly propped yourself up. Looking down, you saw what you were beginning to believe. You had Maylu's body, a complete replica of it.

As much as you wanted to get a grip on this situation, your new skin felt very sensitive against the night wind. Looking over, you saw her clothes where the suit was before. The first clothes were a training bra and panties which you immediately put on. Then came Maylu's classic wear: A light green long-sleeve shirt, a blue evst over it, pink skirt, thigh-high black leggings, and red shoes.
1253322122121.title: The Suit

12533221221211.content:
"Is this what you were trying to tell me?" asked James as he looked around. After discovering the change, you got a good feeling for yourself and make sure you weren't dreaming, you decided to go wake up your friend, James Walker. He had come along on your family trip out here, and he was sleeping in a guest bedroom. You carefully got him up, making sure he didn't freak out when he saw you. You were able to calm him down and get him out of the house, explaining everything along the way.

"Yes, pretty much" you replied.

"Well, it's pretty interesting. Although, what do you want me to do about it?" asked James. You looked over to the Roll suit and picked it up, gesturing to James.

"Well, since I'm Maylu, I wondered if you could be Roll. They go together after all" you said. James gave a rather serious look.

"Look, this is all interesting, but I don't know if I want to be a girl like that" he said. Not missing a beat, you shoved the suit into his arms, making him stumble a bit.

"Oh come on. It'll be fun. Trust me" you said in Maylu's voice. James almost found hard to take you seriously sounding like that, but he sighed anyway.

"All right, I'll do it" he relented, which made you happy. At that, he stripped off his own clothing andf began putting on the Roll suit. Being a NetNavi, Rolls "clothes" were already on her, including her helmet, although everything was deflated at the moment. With that, James got himself in, adjusted it, and zipped it up in the back like you did.

He feimmediate effects, hugging himself as the discomfort came around. You could see Roll's small breasts inflate, while the same pressure in the groin you felt also took place. The clothes, particuarly the boots and helmet, hardened as one would expect. Roll's cyber ponytail also hardened as well. Before long, the discomfort subsided and James was able to stand up.
