125332212212111.content:
"Well, now what?" asked James. You thought for a minute, and then noticed the large machine in the back.

"Let's check that out" you suggested. You and James walked over there, feeling a little odd in your new bodies. When you got there, you saw alot of options on a screen. One of them seemed to imply making these bodies your new ones.

"What does that mean?" James asked.

"I think it means that this machine can make these bodies really ours. I mean, I can still feel the zipper in my back" you said, feeling said zipper. James reached back and he agreed with that.

"All right, well we've come this far. Might as well do it" said James with a smile. You smiled in agreement and pressed the option ont he machine. You both heard it start it and beam two beams of light on you and James. It felt like something was being taken out of you, although it wasn't as bad as the initial transformation. When you both came to, you both saw suits of yourselves. Taking a minute, you both put your suit and clothes where Maylu and Roll used to be.

"All right, so these are our real bodies now. How cool is this?" you said in excitement.

"It's pretty cool, although all the pick is a little offsetting" said James.

"Perhaps" you said. However, you ended up misstepping on a spare part of the warehouse and tripped, falling right into the machine. James gasped and ran over.

"Watch it, you klutz!" he reprimanded.

"Sorry" you apologized. However, that wasn't the end of it. You apparently hit some button on the machine as you fell.

"What did you press?!' asked James franticly.

"I don't know!" you replied.

Suddenly, a great flash of light engulfed both of you, knocking you both out before you knew it.
125332212212111.title: Some messing around

1253322122121111.content:
"Ugh....wha?" you asked groggily as your eyes slowly opened. It seemed like it was broad daylight now, despite it being night before. You were really confused right now.

"Where am I?" you asked yourself as you propped yourself up. You seemed to be in a room, a rather nice one at that, but one that looked clearly made for a girl. Looking down, you saw that you were still Maylu. Not only that, the place looked....how to put it.....animated. Like it was completely different from where you were before.

As you were about to question why, you heard something.

"Anthony!" yelled a feminine voice to your left. You looked over and gasped at what you saw. What was there seemed to be a real PET, or Personal Terminal. It looked like the really old version from earlier games. However, what surprised you the most was seeing Roll in there. However, that meant that....

"James?" you asked as you slid off the bed and walked over, picking up the PET. Roll, or rather James, looked peeved at the moment.

"James, is that you?" you asked. James crossed his, or rather her, arms.

"Yes it's me, and I'm pretty ticked off right now! How did we end up here?" asked James. You really couldn't figure how, although your mind did go back to when you tripped and hit a button. The gears in your head began turning as you figured it out.

"I get it now. I must have hit some button to send us in the Mega Man world. Apparently, we also stay as ourselves. So that's why you are in there" you explained. James nodded in understanding but still looked ticked off.

"Seriously? Ain't that great, so instead of simply enjoying a costume, I'm now stuck in a life-or-death world?" he asked.

"Well, I guess. Look, I guess we just have to act things out for now. I don't know if we can even get back to our world, so we have to keep things as normal as possible" you explained. James sighed, before smirking a bit.

"Fine. As you wish "Maylu"" James taunted, giggling as he did which made him blush a bit out of embaressment. You smirked as well.

"Very well "Roll", guess we need to be off then. Looks like it's 7:20 right now. Can you see if there's a schedule in there somewhere?" you asked.

"I suppose, although although I've never been this hands-on with a computer before" said James.

"Neither have I" you said. James looked around his personal space within the PET. There wasn't much in it. Perhaps he could decorate it a bit. Hey, if he had to live here for a long time, he might as well get comfortable. Anyway, a screen appeared in front of him. Not questioning it, James tried to search for a schedule or calendar or whatever. Luckily, he was able to find one.

"Ah, here we go. Looks like today is a school day, and it starts at 8:00. So better get a move on" said James.

"Right away" you replied.
1253322122121111.title: Waking up in a new world

12533221221211111.content:
With this new realization, you realized that you needed to get the day going. After all, you had to play the part well, as no one knew how long this would go on. You strapped your PET into a holder on your hip and grabbed what seemed to be your backpack on the ground. It felt wierd to be doing this, like you were in elementary school again, which you were for the most part now. You sighed as that realization came to you. Then again, that means it probably won't be hard, since you had the intelligence of a high schooler.

Long story short: you walked down and encountered a dark-haired woman who was likely Maylu's mother. You had breakfast there, making sure what nothing seemed off about you. With that, you waved good bye to "Mom" and ran out the door, finding Maylu's scooter along the way. With that, you were on the way to school.

"Wow, so this is what ACDC Town looks like up close" you said to yourself in awe. It always amazed you that DenTech City contained so many different location. You asked James if he thought the same way but he didn't answer. Making sure you didn't run into anything, you pulled your pink PET out of its holder and looked at James, who seemed to be looking at something.

"What are you doing?" you asked.

"Learning the system of course. If I have to be the Navi, then I better learn who to work stuff. Otherwise, we won't get anything done and people will get suspicious" he explained.

"Good call" you replied, rubbing your neck briefly. Hearing such a young girly voice come out of your mouth still felt wierd, which James agreed with. Then, you remembered that you really have no idea where the school actually is. You asked James if there was a map in there somewhere. Thankfully. he was able to find one in a file. It was a good thing that he was pretty good with computers to begin with.

With that in mind, you rode all the way to the academy, following James' instructions.s you imagined, that place was huge. Luckily, there was a school schedule and such in the file James found. You were able to use that to find your locker and get what you needed for the few classes.

"What would you do without me" James said in a matter-of-fact fashion. You told him to not push his luck, which he just smirked about. That being said, you were able to find the classroom easily. However, along the way, you couldn't help but notice a couple of strange looks at you.

"I think we're getting looks from some of the guys" you whispered to James.

"Guess now we know how that feels like from this angle" said James as you sat down in your seat, nodding in agreement as you did. You had to admit that the skirt felt really wierd though, especially considering its length. James fighred that it might be more bearable after a while.
12533221221211111.title: On their way

125332212212111111.content:
After a while, you couldn't wait for class to start. A few minutes ago, you nearly jumped out of your seat when Dex Oyama, one of Lan and Maylu's friends, came right behind you to say hi. You grumbled a "Hello" right back at him but you were still annoyed at that little stunt. You could hear James slight giggling to himself at the sight. Soon enough, Ms. Mari, the teacher, came in.

"Hello class..." she started before a loud "BAM!!" came from the door. Ms. Mari looked startled for a second before opening the door, allowing a dazed Lan Hikari to fall to the ground.

"I was wondering when he would show. Guess he really is late all the time" you said to yourself, smiling a bit though as you said that. As you imagined, Lan got a stern talking to before being allowed to get to his seat. He then looked right at you and smiled, saying that this was a personal best for him, which made you sigh at him. He was as clueless as advertised.

Eventually, Ms. Mari got the class going. The first class of the day was English, which was no problem for you so you kind of zoned out a bit. You remembered that the other navi's often got together inside the computer, so you naturally considered having James go in as well. He denied wanting to go at first though.

"Are you kidding? I don't want to have GutsMan breathing down my neck" reasoned James.

"Just wing it then. You'll have MegaMan to protect you after all" you smiled as you plugged in the PET and downloaded James into the computer. After you did that, you started writing some notes, at least to keep appearances up.

*****Cyberworld*****

After downloading, James appeared in the cyberworld, seeing a tiled landscape with a number theme through the "sky". James groaned at his luck.

"Darn it Anthony. Just my luck" he grumbled. Suddenly, he heard giant steps behind him. He looked behind to see the ape-like navi himself, GutsMan.

"GutsMan happy to see Roll!" he nearly shouted, making James wince a bit. It would have been hard enough enduring GutsMan as a guy, but now he was stuck as the navi he had a crush on (as if Roll would ever return them though). Still, you had to get used to this sometime.

"Y-Yeah...um, hi" James replied, not quite in his strongest voice. Thankfully, he was saved when he heard more navis coming in. He looked back to see MegaMan and Glyde come in. James breathed a sigh of relief, as GutsMan instantly changed tactics and went after MegaMan. However, after a brief hello, MegaMan passed right by him.

"Hi Roll, how are you doing?" he asked politely. James felt himself calm down, as MegaMan was an easy person to talk to, although the whole being Roll thing still made James feel wierd.

"I'm good, thank you" James replied. Glide came over, acting in his usual gentlemanly nature. James allowed himself to smile a bit. Perhaps he could work this out.

*****Real World*****

The day just seemed to breeze by for the most part. Many of the classroom topics were things that you already knew, but you kept writing just for the heck of it.

However, soon enough, it came time for Virus Busting class.
125332212212111111.title: First Class

125332212212111112.content:
Just before the class began, the inevitable happened.

"Oh hi Maylu!" came a strange voice from behind you. However, you remembered it well and facepalmed before turning around. It from noe other than Dex Oyama, the NetOp (Network Operator) of GutsMan. This guy had a major crush on Maylu, which was also reflected in GutsMan, who liked Roll. If memory served, both girls shared mutual disgust of such a thought.

"Oh god, are you kidding me? I gotta deal with this?" you yelled mentally. James was thinking the exact same thing. He kind of liked GutsMan and all, but the last thing he needed was to be the object of his affection, which was almost enough to make him hurl.

Quite honestly, you wondered how to handle this. Outside of Maylu's own family, this was your first real encounter with someone. Your mouth kept moving but only stutters came out. Unfortunately, Dex noticed.

"Hmm? You ok Maylu?" Dex questioned, leaning a little closer. Perhaps a little too close for your liking. Quite frankly, you were close to panic mode, and your mind was racing for an answer.

"What to do?! What to do?!" your mind screamed. Suddenly, as if answering your prayers or something, a wierd presence began to fill you up. It was a bizarre feeling, like you were still in control to an extent but like there was another mind in there somewhere. What you did know though that suddenly your mind felt clear and you looked straight at Dex, a friendly smile appearing on your face.

"I'm fine Dex. Just spaced out for a second" you said. You felt wierd as those words left your mouth. It didn't sound like you talking, even though it technically was. This was confusing as heck. Luckily, Dex grinned, obviously buying whatever that was.

"You spacing out? Didn't peg you as one. Figured that was more Lan's thing. I get the feeling he's rubbing off on you in a bad way" saidDex, laughing as he said that last part. Your expression angered as he said that.

"Just what do you mean by that?" you said in a tone that wasn't harsh, but enough to get the point across. Dex backed upa bit, nodding his head rapidly. ace smiled again.

"Good" you said happily, giggling slightly. Dex told a seat behind you, feeling like he dodged a bullet there. As you turned your face back to your desk, you suddenly felt forced to the front again, the wierd sensation gone.

"Woah man. What was that?" asked James from the PET. "If I didn't know better, I could swear that you were acting just like Maylu"

"W-What? D-Don't say something wierd like that!" you almost yelled, not wanting to believe what he just said. James flinched a bit, putting his hands up in surrender of that subject.

However, before you could think about about James said, the door opened, meaning class would begin now.
125332212212111112.title: Before the class starts

1253322122121111121.content:
As you expected, Ms. Mari came through the door, greeting the class as she came in.

"Hello everyone...." CRASH!!!

A loud noise erupted from the door that Ms. Mari closed behind her, startling everyone including you. She slowly reopened the door, and a dazed Lan Hikari fell to the ground in a heap.

"Wow. He's even funnier up close" you thought to yourself. You could tell that James was laughing as well. Lan slowly got up, much to his chagrin and looked at Ms. Mari, who wasn't too pleased.

"Nice of you to join us Lan" she said in a somewhat scary tone. Lan flinched a bit.

"Hey, I almost made it this time" he defended himself. The rest of the class just laughed at him, and you had to laugh as well. It was too funny not too. Embaressed a bit, Lan walked over to his seat, which was right next to yours. He sulked a bit as he did, muttering about something incoherently. You decided to let him cool off for a while.

Anyway, long story short, it felt like most elementary schools, as you had different class periods with the same teacher. For appearances' sake, you wrote notes, but didn't really pay attention. You already knew this stuff, and you had more important things to worry about. What really happened back there with Dex? Did some part of Maylu take you over? Was it trying to overwhelm you? So many questions that you didn't have answers to.

James wasn't feeling that great either. How could he, being stuck as he was? It felt wierd to be wearing what he was wearing. That being said, he at least tried to get a feel for what to look for in the PET. Other than that, nothing really interesting happened, although you did hear Lan challenge Dex to a netbattle later on. Getting a good look at Lan's PET, you saw the generic navi he had at the beginning of the series.

"So, I'm at the very beginning" you thought to yourself. After some classes, you had lunch from the cafeteria, which was satisfactory. However, Maylu's short skirt really became a bother later on, as you still felt some stares at you.

"I'm telling you, I'll make it next time!" sweared Lan as he ate his lunch next to you. Feeling a little more comfortable, you tried to manage the situation without the aid of some wierd mental thing.

"Doubt it. Pigs will fly before you consistantly get here on time" you smirked at him, which made him more frustrated.
1253322122121111121.title: "Maylu's" first class

125332212221.content:
Will you choose Sonia? Lyra will be in her guitar if that is the case.

Sonia and Lyra: http://images.wikia.com/megaman/images/0...
Sonia when she combines with Lyra to form Lyra Note: http://static.minitokyo.net/downloads/46...
125332212221.title: Sonia?

1253322122211.content:
"Dang, what a place" you said to yourself. That didn't even begin to describe what you saw. Upon inspecting the many shelfs of suits, you discovered that they indeed were suits. It was kind of cool, yet also kind of creepy. There were suits of all kinds, from any series you could imagine. Naturally, being a video game lover, you decided to check out the video game section.

"So many to pick from. Whoever made this had a lot of free time" you chuckled to yourself. Eventually, you found yourself in the Mega Man section. Being curious about it, you took a look at the shelf. When you did that, your eyes were drawn to a certain duo of suits. Bringing your hand over one, you saw that this one was the suit of Sonia Sky from the MegaMan Star Force games.

"Hmm, well I guess this could be interesting" you said as you brought the suit up. Sonia was 11 years, so naturally the suit would probably be incredibly small to someone like you. However, your curiosity was getting the best of you, so you decided to try it on. At that, you stripped your normal clothes on, feeling a little chilly from the cool night air. You certainly didn't want to be naked for long. With that in mind, you unzipped the zipper in the back and gently put one foot in, partly thinking that you're crazy.

However, the foot seemed to fit in like a glove, expanding a bit to fit you.

"Wierd" you say but you decide to continue. You place another foot in and the same thing happens. You put your arms through each sleeve and duck your head into the head part. You adjust it so your eyes and mouth are exposed and begin to pull the zipper up the back. Soon enough, you zipped it right up to the top of your neck.

As you did, a searing pain ripped through your body, causing you to grab yourself and fall to the ground. Itwasn't the worst feeling but it was enough for you to groan in discomfort. The skin felt like it was crawling, moving over your body. A particular pressure began to build in your chest and groin. Opening one eye, you gasped as the empty little breasts of the suit expanded, although not much given Sonia's age. However, a huge pressure built up in your groin, as if it was trying to push your manhood out of existance. A pressure also began building in your head, as if it was trying to take root in your skull as well.

Before long, it ended as quickly as it began. Panting in slight exhaustion, you slowly propped yourself up. Looking down, you saw what you were beginning to believe. You had Sonia's body, a complete replica of it.

"No way" you gasped out, your hands flying to your mouth as a high feminine voice scaped your mouth instead of your usual masculine one. However, what snapped you out of this was feeling a small chill breeze through the shack, reminding you that you were naked. You would catch a cold if this wasn't stopped quickly. With that in mind, you ran over and grabbed Sonia's clothes, which were laying neatly together on the shelf.

You had no problem with the underwear, as it invulved just simple panties and a training bra. Next came a yellow t-shirt along with her light green shorts. Finishing up the look was Sonia's trademark pink hoodie and blue boots.
1253322122211.title: The Singer's Outfit

12533221222111.content:
"Wow, unreal" you gasped out loud, feeling the new kid-like body you had. It was perhaps that most bizarre thing you had ever experienced, which was currently conflicting with the part of you that found this very awesome. As you felt various places, you still felt the zipper at the top of your neck.

"Guess it doesn't completely change" you said to yourself. As you looked around, you happened to spot a small portable device near one of the shelves. Curious, you walked over and grabbed the device. As you pressed the buttons, wierd commands seemed to appear on the device. One of which was "Complete Swap?" with the usual options. You had no idea as to what that meant, but your anxious fingers ended up pressing the button on the "Yes" option.

Immediately, a new feeling ripped through your body, like you were merging with the suit even more than you did before. Luckily, this effect didn't last long as the pain you felt with the suit. However, it was still enough to make you gasp for breath when it was done. At first, you didn't think anything changed, until you felt your neck again. The zipper was gone!

"Huh? It's gone, but then what happened to...." you started, wondering what that meant for your body if this suit was totally yours now. However, you soon felt something against your foot. You looked down to see a suit made of your old body there.

"Oh, so that's what it does" you said as you picked the suit up. Wanting to keep it safe for now, you placed it and your clothes neatly into the spot where Sonia's originally was.

"Well, this is cool and all, but I really need to watch what I press from now on" you said to yourself. This was strange stuff after all. Anyway, while figuring out your next move, you spotted a larger machine in the very back.

"Another machine?" you wondered as you walked near it. Just how many machines were there in this little shack? Regardless, you decided to take a look anyway. You gently pushed what seemed to be an "On" button and you heard the machine roar to life.

"Cool" you smiled as you looked at the screen. You pressed another button, seemingly getting to another option. This one seemed to say "Transport?" with yes or no options.

"Transport where?" you wondered out loud. Curious as ever, you pressed the "Yes" option. Suddenly, the machine seemed to rev up, and a bright flash of light blinded you until you blacked out.
12533221222111.title: More Exploration

125332212221111.content:
For the longest time, you felt as if you were floating in some deep, dark void. Of course, it all seemed to grind to a halt as you suddenly felt yourself "landing" on something pretty soft. In addition, you could feel the early morning sunshine come down on your face.

"Ugh, what hit me? I feel like a truck ambushed me" you said to yourself as you groggily propped yourself up. What you awoke too seemed to be some kind of hotel room. A pretty fancy one at that, not one that you ever got to stay in. You took one quick look down, seeing that your body was still that of Sonia's.

"Ok, so I'm still Sonia. But where am I?" you asked yourself. Looking to your left, you saw Sonia's guitar hung up in a place where it wouldn't break. Deciding that it was time to get up, you got up from the bed and grabbed the yellow guitar.

"Wow, it's actually lighter than I thought" you said out loud. Looking at the front of the guitar, you saw where the guitar served some properties similar to a transer. It made you wonder how Sonia made it work though.

"Guess I can figure that out later" you said as you kept the guitar with you, walking over to where a small kitchen was. You felt pretty hungry, which made you wonder about how long you were out.

"Did I sleep through the night? Or was it already morning when I got here?" you wondered. Your head began to hurt though from all this hard thinking, so you figured that it was best to leave it alone for now. You had bigger problems, like how in the world were you going to be able to pass as Sonia here? You pretty much came to the conclusion that this was her world that you were in now, given the animated look to everything.

Taking another look to Sonia's guitar, you saw that it was empty.

"So that means Lyra hasn't appeared yet" you said to yourself as you grabbed a roll out of the kitchen.
125332212221111.title: Waking up

1253322122211112.content:
Before you could think of your next move, a strange voice echoed out.

"Ah, a perfect EM wave freqency!" the voice seemed to echo from all directions. At first, you looked around frantically, before remembering who it could be.

"That sounds like...Lyra! Dang, what timing" you thought. Right as you thought that, a beam of pink light rained down from the ceiling, enveloping you in its light.

"Ahhhhh!" you almost screamed. The feeling was bizarre. You weren't in pain, but it wasn't pleasant either. It almost felt like a wierd version of being electrocuted. For a second, it felt like the light was going to completely envelop you, but before it could, it slowly dissipated, as if it ran out of juice.

"Well, that was a shock" you said, shivering a bit from the tingly electric feeling flowing through you. You really hope that that would be the last time you'd have to endure that.

"It didn't work. Why is that?" you heard a soft voice. Knowing who it could be, you looked at Sonia's guitar. There in the.....flesh....was the FMian, Lyra. She wore a disgruntled look on her face as you looked at her.

"Who are you?! And what did you just do to me?!" you nearly screamed at her. Of course, you already knew those answers, but you had to play the role. Things could get out of hand very quickly if you didn't get into character.

"My name is Lyra, and I'm a being from Planet FM. You've probably never heard of it, but it's quite far from here" explained Lyra. Again, it was stuff you already knew.Nevertheless, you tried to keep the act up.

"O-OK. Well then, what were you trying to do to me? What did I ever do to you?!" you kept yelling. Honestly, you were pretty sure you weren't acting anything like Sonia, but it's not like Lyra knew that. Lyra seemed to cross her arms, as if contemplating something.

"Well, to be honest, I had hoped to take control of your body. Your EM wave frequency is the same as mine, so I naturally went to you. My orders were to apprehend a friend of mine, but who knows if it's worth it" said Lyra. Again, you knew what she meant.

"Well, I've heard of strange beings appearing and messing things up. Guess that's you and your friends?"you asked.

"I guess so, although the other FMians and I don't really see eye-to-eye alot" said Lyra. You knew that, as Lyra wasn't quite as motivated as other FMians. After all, she did kind of like Omega-Xis. However, Lyra then spoke again.

"By the way, you say other things have been happening, but the city looks intact. Someone being a hero?" Lyra seemed to smirk a bit at that.

"Yeah, because Mega Man always helps out" you said. Lyra didn't know anything personal about Sonia, so you were free to do some things that the normal Sonia probably wouldn't have known.

"Mega Man? Ah, of course, must be Omega-Xis. So he found a human host of his own. I'm guessing he couldn't take control either" said Lyra.
1253322122211112.title: An unexpected visitor

12533221222111121.content:
Putting aside Lyra's remarks, you pressed Lyra further. One thing seemed off. You didn't think Lyra would be so straightforward. If you recalled correctly, she wasn't big on trust.

"Lyra, why are you being so straight with me? Don't you think I might babble about this to someone?" you asked. Lyra smirked at you.

"Well, since you were able to resist my control, I figured that I might as well come clean. No use holding back if this wasn't going to work. Don't think that this means I trust you either. I'm not entrusting you with anything" explained Lyra.

"Maybe you should just leave" you replied.

"That wouldn't be beneficial to me. You and I share the same frequency. I don't have much else to go at the moment, so I'll just hang out here until I get bored" said Lyra.

"You really got an attitude problem" you spat at Lyra. Quite honestly, you weren't thinking about acting like Sonia like you. Lyra was really ticking you off!

"I could say the same about you. Although, it is rather refreshing to see someone so fiesty" said Lyra. You sighed in response. Lyra would probably drive you crazy right now.

"Fine, whatever. You can stay as long as you want. In return though, I'd like some help from you" you said, trying to sound in control, which didn't sound like much with your little girl voice.

"Oh, and what kind of help would that be?" sneered Lyra, as if she didn't believe your words. However, you soon both heard someone knocking on the door.

"Sonia! Open up Sonia!" came the loud voice of a man. You noticed that it had to be Sonia's agent, who was intolerable at best.

"Oh no, not him! Get me somewhere else. Anywhere that's away from him!" you cried out, hoping to escape this situation. Lyra shrugged.

"Fine fine, but don't cry to me if we go somewhere worse. Beggers can't be choosers" smirked Lyra. At that, Lyra's music-based pink energy engulfed you. You felt extremely lightweight as Lyra pulled you both out of the the hotel room.

As you sped away, you could hear the faint cry of the agent noticing that Sonia was gone, which made you giggle a bit.

Where did you and Lyra end up?
12533221222111121.title: More Conversation

125332212221111211.content:
Before too long, you felt solid ground beneath your feet. You still felt a tingling feeling as the pink light disappeared.

"Shocking, huh? Such high-speed travel must by new to you humans" smirked Lyra from tha guitar. Once you got your bearings back, you glared at her.

"Do you have to be a smart-alek about everything? you stared at her. Lyra shrugged. Anyway, you heard many noises around you and looked around. You were now in some amusement park that Echo Ridge apprently had.

"Wow. I didn't know this place had an amusement park" you said in awe.

"What do you humans do here anyway? I just picked a random spot to transport to" said Lyra. You looked at Lyra as you adjusted the guitar to your back.

"Well, it's a place where you do lots of fun stuff basically" you replied. You hadn't been to an amusement park in a while, so this should be fun. Of course, there was the fact that you had the body of a famous celebrity though. That could cause some issues. As you thought about it though, Lyra perked up suddenly.

"What is it?" you asked, as you were jerked a bit by Lyra's sudden movement.

"I sense another EM being nearby" said Lyra. You wondered if could perhaps be Omega-Xis. Either him or another FM alien. Either way, it intrigued you to find him and his partner, Geo Stelar, sooner. Perhaps you could become friends with him sooner than the games or anime showed. With that, your mind was made up and you asked Lyra where she felt it. She explained that it was a bit to the west, although she wondered why you asked. As she did ask though, you sprinted off in the direction she pointed out.

As odd as you felt, running in this little girl body, you were determined to get the ball rolling on this. You knew what would happen eventually anyway. After sprinting for a while, and panting in exhaustion a little bit, you spotted Geo himself, seemingly hiding from something. You wondered if he was hiding from his classmates.

"Hello. What are you doing?" you asked with a smile as you approached him. Geo seemed a little startled from your sudden entry, although he calmed down quickly.

"Uh, nothing too important. Just....hiding" he told you. That pretty much confirmed your suspisions. "Don't tell them I'm here. I'm getting a bit annoyed with my classmates' antics" he continued.

"No problem. Your secret is safe with me. Come with me for a second" you said as you grabbed his arm and pulled him into the nearby bushes.

"What are you doing?" Geo asked as calmly as he could.

"Just a second" you requested from him. After thinking that you both were good, you turned to him. "Sorry about that. I just wanted to get out of everyone's way. I'm Anth-Sonia Strumm. Nice to meet you" you introduced yourself, catching on to your little name slip and offering a handshake. Thankfully, Geo thought nothing of it and shook back.

"Nice to meet you. I'm Geo Stelar" he introduced himself.
125332212221111211.title: An amusement park

1253322122211112111.content:
As Geo introduced himself, you gave him a little smirk.

"Hello Geo....or should I say Mega Man?" you continued smirking. Geo however immediately broke the handshake, a little surprised and worried that someone knew. Part of him began to wonder though if you were just playing around.

"Relax, I won't tell anyone. It just wasn't that hard to tell that it was you. I've heard about all those neat things you've done for Echo Ridge" you tried to explain, which seemed to calm him down a bit.

"Ok, I believe you, but how did you figure that out?" Geo asked. You pointed to your guitar.

"She told me. Her name is Lyra" you introduced her to Geo, to which you heard her grunt a little, which was kind of amusing. However, you both were startled by a growling noise.

"Lyra?!! Here?!!" yelleda loud voice as a green light materized from Geo's transer. There formed Omega-Xis, an AMian and Geo's partner, who fuse together to become Mega Man. When he materialized, Lyra did the same.

"Well, it's been a while Mega. How are you doing?" Lyra spoke in an amused tone. Omega-Xis growled.

"Why did you have to be sent of all people?" he spat out, to which Lyra narrowed her eyes.

"Because I'm just as capable a warrior as you, or have you forgotten?" she questioned. The conversation ended up going back and forth, and you and Geo separated yourselves from the argument.

"Sorry about that" said Geo. You gave him a sincere smile.

"No problem. I'm just glad to meet the actual Mega Man" you told him, glad to actually meet a hero like him. Geo blushed a bit at the compliment.

"It's nothing. Mostly it's Mega's power" he said.

"How modest of you" you replied. Suddenly, Geo's eyes perked up.

"Wait a second, you said you're Sonia Strumm? That famous clebrity?" he asked with surprise.

"Well, I guess that's what they call me" you replied. Geo was still surprised.

"Wow. To meet someone like you out here" he said. However, you calmed him down.

"Let's not think about status right now. How about we go and have fun on the rides? I've been bored for quite some time" you suggested, gesturing to the rides. Geo looked a little cautious about it but gave a small smile anyway.

"Sure, why not" he replied.
1253322122211112111.title: Mega Man himself

12533222.content: How about the Wild Arms series?
12533222.title: Wild Arms?

125332221.content: Will you choose a suit from Wild Arms 3 or 4 (as these are the only ones I have, these are the ones I'll start with)?
125332221.title: Wild Arms 3 or 4?

choices: Female version of a male team member

125332221112.title: Female version of a male character?

12533222222211.content:
While Resident Evil always had a very impressive collection of cool and interesting female characters, Ada Wong was always the one that stood out the most to you. Ever since getting the fourth game and getting the chance to really play as her, you just found that you got kind of hooked with her. You found her to be an incredibly interesting character, and constantly wanted to know more about her. And now, you had the chance to actually BECOME her, and learn things about her better than anybody else could. It was an offer you found it impossible to refuse.


You pull the hollow suit off the hook, and try to find some kind of opening. After a couple of seconds, you find a skin-colored zipper running along the spine of the suit. Without hesitating you undress and start by slipping your feet into the suits. Next up came the legs, and after them the waist. With each body-part you covered, you start to dress in the suit quicker and quicker. Soon enough, the only thing left is to stick your head into the suits and pull the zipper. You hold your breath, as if to reassure yourself that everything is going to work out, and stick your head into the suits, aligning the features along the way. Without putting more thoughts into it, you finish by zipping up.

For a brief moment you feel like you lose total control over your body, but after a while you feel your senses return to you, except that they now feel quite... Entirely new and weird. Looking down, you could clearly see why. Gone was your male body, replaced with the gorgeous naked (female) body of special agent Ada Wong. "Wicked" you coo in her sultry voice. You tried out a few stretching manuvers, and tried to get a bit more comfortable in your new form. Reaching for the back, you found that the zipper was gone. Once you wished for the zipper to come back however, it appeared again. You sighed with relief, now knowing that you could just take it off if you really wanted to. You also realized you had the memories of Ada, which also helped you get more used to your body and the ways of being a woman.

You reached for her evening dress and started to dress yourself. The heels were a bit of a bother, but Adas memories helped you get used to using them. You also notice her equipment lying on a bench next to the hook, and strap them to the belt on your new exposed thigh. Eventually, you are a perfect copy of Ada Wong, if not actually her. You notice a mirror to your side, and gaze lovingly at your new form. A smile forms on your new lips as you run your hands over your new body. "I could certainly get used to this."

You also notice what looks like a pair of very odd machines. Looking at the note stuck to one of them, you learn that one of them can make the suit into your real body, and the other can actually transport you into the world the suit comes from. Naturally, both seemed incredibly interesting, but even so... You look down at your body again, and smile again as you stroke your chest gently. While you were up for an adventure, you had this gorgeous body all for yourself, and letting it go to waste felt silly. Then again, maybe it wasn't that important. To say the least, you were quite torn about it.

Anthony walked around for quite a while, looking at every shelf with increasing bursts of curiosity, beginning with the row that consisted of girls (and a few men) from games. He made quite a few stops, occasionally bursting out the names of characters he recognized. He made his final stop at the shelf that contained suits of characters from the Street Fighter, but he quickly made up his mind when he reached that point. He wanted to try it all out, but he knew he had to begin somewhere if that was the case. He turned his heel and went back the way he came, and stopped at the beginning, now end. He noted that the shelves were sorted in alphapetic order, depending on the name of the game(s) the characters appeared him, so he was starting out with A. After a fair bit of walking, he came across suits of the characters from Batman - the Arkham-universe to be precise.

The first thing he noticed where the suits of the female characters, and he quickly - almost jumping - ran over to them, and began pondering on which to pick.

125332222222222221.content:
Of course it would be Catwoman. Anthony has had a crush on her ever since he saw her in the opening scenes of Batman: Arkham City. His friends were all hot for Harley, but to Anthony she had about the same appeal as a flat car tire. No, the sultry, black-kevlar clad Catwoman is more his style. And now....he could...BE her? That was just too good to be true, so of course he had to try it out. Picking it up off the shelf, he noticed there were two different suits: the Catsuit and the Selina Kyle suit. Both had an opening in the top half of the body, Selina in the back between the shoulder blades and Catsuit between the breasts.

First, he picked up the Selina suit. After all, the Catsuit wouldn't fit Anthony, and he'd probably look quite odd in it.
First, Anthony picked up the Selina suit and examined it. He discarded his clothing and threw away his shoes. He then put the suit on, and after an awkward few seconds he suddenly felt his body reshaping. Bones cracking and shifting, his body becoming muscular yet very slender, with hardly any decrease in size. Catwoman was, after all, rather tall. He then felt his manhood being pressed in by the suit, only leaving a vagina, and the chest part merges to fit his own chest. He now had breasts, which were quite large yet no bother at all. He also gained Selina Kyle's short haircut, and her beautiful green eyes.

The transformation being complete, he looked in the mirror and saw only Selina Kyle, the famous cat burglar known as Catwoman.

((Let's skip all that boring 'Find Suit freak out call friend action and get right to the thick of it, eh?))

“Dude… why aren’t you freaking out?” Anthony was a wee bit confused as her friend just sat there, flipping through his magazine, instead of losing his marbles at the sight of a video game vixen before him. “You see… Anthony. I’m a teenager, with unrestricted access to the internet and all manner of imagery. If some sexy... big breasted Jedi wishes to wriggle and touch herself in front of me… awesome, but unless you plan on putting out… don’t waste my time. Brianna’s more likely to give me some than you are.” He turned another page and seemed to be done with the discussion.

Anthony’s arms just fell to her side, her face screwed up in some mix between being let down and amusement. “Fine… wasting your time am I?” Anthony flicked her wrist casually, and the GameInformer in Randy’s hands was tossed aside.

“Dude… stop messing with my shiz…. Close your top up and give me the sticks. I wanna get some Mass Effect on.” He reached forward and turned on the 360 as Anthony sat down on the couch, buttoning up her top and handing Randy the controller, all the while looking confused.

“So you’re seriously… not even interested in letting me boss you around for a bit with this body?” It was like this entire plan was for naught.

“Like I said, Bro… Either open your lips, or shut your mouth.” Matter-of-factly, Anthony was silenced.

“Look! I don’t care what kind of day you’re having; you don’t come into my house and talk like that to me! Either calm down or get out. How’s THAT for an ultimatum for you.” He had gotten slightly riled up, emotions must’ve been a new thing to Satele because her face had become flushed, her chest was heaving up and down and up and down, a few hairs out of place… and Randy was digging it.

He dropped the controller and looked at Anthony, a sort of look in his eyes. “Alright, Man… I’m sorry. Let’s just calm down.” He reached forward to wrap an arm around Ant’s shoulder, it coming to rest right on her left breast. Eventually, his other hand came around to keep the other boob company. “You know I like aggressive chicks… you really wanted me to do this to you?”

Anthony almost didn’t understand what was happening until he felt those big boobs on her chest, moving up and down and feeling rather bare against the wind. Randy had gotten her shirt, robe and bra off without Ant noticing.

“Really good at this aren’t you… who have you been practicing on?” Anthony said, trying to slide away without much issue, although Randy sure as hell wasn’t going to give up.
“I did say that Brianna was likely to give me some, right? You ply her with enough booze and she’s like slutty putty. “He paused to think about what had to have been a lovely evening, while Anthony stood up and tried to walk away, putting on some sort of top and wondering how he got himself in this deep.

“Nope.” Randy grabbed her arm and sat her back down on the couch, ignoring above the waist for now and getting that belt of hers off. “Wait uh… Randy was that the doorbell?” She said trying to get away from this.

“Don’t talk for a while dude… I gotta focus.” Ant was NOT going to sit there and just take this, he tried to push away from Randy, not really remembering her almighty powers and abilities, but Randy in some sort of horny rage wasn’t going to be out shoved.

Meanwhile! Thousands of Miles Away!

A young Boricua was walking through the city streets, eyes bouncing back and forth between iPod screen and road, hoping not to get ran over. Stopping at a crosswalk, she sighed and wondered what to do with the rest of her day. Pulling out her phone, she checked her online friends and what not. “Nope… no… no… N- BING BONG! StarFighter364 is online… time to go bother, Nathan.”

Turning right around, she began a quick and speedy B-Line to Nathan’s Pad! After a perilous journey, crossing 4 blocks and a trip to a pizza place, she arrived at her destination, a bag of garlic knots in hand and a box of Hawaiian Barbecue Pizza!

She rang the doorbell, waiting a few moments while humming the Doctor Who theme. After no reply she bent over and pulled the spare key from the false rock. She’d been at this house too much… Pushing open the door she kept up her song, hoping to find a good reason as to why she was being ignored. Coming around the corner into the living room she came upon… ugh… such a weird sight.

Randy was trying to plow Satele Shan… that asshole. Satele was putting up a fight but damn.. Randy was resilient! Like Lupin the III. He had at least 2 fingers in her mouth, his pants down and one hand around her waist, trying to pull her in.

“Alriiiiiiiiight.” Brianna set down the pizza, hoping all this fuckery would come to an end. She was sadly mistaken. They were still going at it and Brianna got a wee bit mad. “Oi! You lot! Stuff it!” The two stopped immediately. “Randy, Get the fuck off her! Satele... Cover yourself up! I don’t care what the tradition is on Naboo, This is Earth! Put on some damn pants."

The two of them split apart and Satele even tried to smooth over her skirt. “Now… disregarding the fact that I’m WAY disgusted at you. Why did you bring a Cosplaying Prostitute to Nathan’s… don’t you have a house?” She crossed her arms, ready to throw the both of them out when Satele did the unthinkable.

She stood up, Brianna and Randy’s eyes on her bare chest, one in anger, one in want. Reaching a hand behind her head, she did some odd fumbling for a moment and then… removed her head… like a mask. Letting it hang limp over her chest, both people came upon the view of Anthony’s head, resting on Satele’s body…. Or inside her skin.

“I told you to stop calling me Nathan, Bunny.” A nickname Brianna had always despised. Another thing she despised, although fairly new on the list… was her perception of reality being destroyed as it was right now. Her entire body swayed on the spot before she fell forward, her head crashing into the oak end table and passing right out.

“Good Job, Anthony. You killed her.” He looked down at Brianna’s lifeless form before bouncing to Satele’s hands, then her chest and then Anthony’s face. “Lend me that suit for a bit… I got an idea to save her. Thief’s Honor” Anthony wasn’t even going to consider it… but honor amongst thieves was serious business.

What to do?

12533222222222222222.content:
"Geez about how big is this space anyway?" You mutter under your breath at the what appears to be the latest door you come across in what could be describe as an endless hallway. A quick peek to see the number of doors that you haven't check out that appears to go on forever further proven your assessment. "Though I don't see why the last two door have to do with video games anyway?" You think out loud before looking at the nameplate attach to the door before you.

"Fate/Series"

Beneath the nameplate is a picture of a petite blonde woman in wearing armor over a blue dress standing tall with a sword held in front of her. One look in the blonde's piercing green eyes and instantly it clicks.

Saber.

It's none other than Saber from Fate/Stay Night.

Which this is kind of odd since Fate/Stay Night is a visual-style novel but who cares! It's here, so best not to think about it right now.

The Fate series itself was a bit interesting to you when you happen upon the Anime upon chance while surfing through the internet. At first it was simple curiosity, then interest, and finally you were hook on it. The battle between heroes of legend, the people who summon them into the modern world, and the "occasional" H-scene that pops up every now and then (you found that out when doing a little research into the series). Plus, if the nameplate is anything to go by, then this room contains material from Fate/EXTRA and Fate/Zero as well!

Already you can feel anticipation rising. What marvels await you beyond the other side of the door? Just open the door. That's it. A simple action, just open the door and see what wonders lie beyond the door.

But there's a feeling, a quiet nipping feeling at the back of your mind to go to the next door. It was a feeling you're all too familiar with. The feeling to go deeper into this hallway of doors, passing video game series after video game series as if your very actions are being controlled by an unseen power. Even now you can hear it's presence whisper into your ear, whispering that you should go to the next door and repeat the cycle.

You feel torn. There in front of you lies the world of Fate and all it's wonders, but what else could be there at the door next?

As you wander through the isles, finding it hard to decide on a suit to try on, or even if you wanted to try any on at all. That was until a particular set of suits caught your eyes.

"Hey, aren't these WarioWare characters?" you say to yourself, noting the characters hanging there. "I wonder why they're not with the Mario characters." Regardless of where they were being kept, you were actually somewhat fond of the WarioWare cast, even if most of their games revolved around the microgames instead of the characters.

"Hm, who should I try on?" It sounded so weird saying it out loud. The first suit to catch your eye was that of the young witch Ashley. She seemed to be a favourite for a lot of people. You wouldn't mind getting inside her head, and the rest of her body too. Of course, there were other characters on the rack too.

1253322222222222222221222211.content:
Deciding you might as well try on the Ashley suit, you take off your clothes, leaving them next to the shelf were Ashley's clothes were sitting, and take the suit off the rack. "This is waaay to small for me," you mutter to yourself. Still, the note had mentioned the magic of his place, so if it was right then the small size of the suit compared to your own body should be no problem.

Stepping one leg into the suit, you find Ashley's leg only comes up to about your knee, but you don't let that discourage you. You step the other leg in and attempt to pull the suit up a bit higher so that you can slot your arms in without squatting down. However, rather than the suit pulling up higher, your legs seem to shrink down into the suit, becoming smaller and thinner. You were shocked by this, barely able to move as it occurred, and as such, you were still pulling the top of the suit up tight as you had been before the shrinking started. Once your legs were short enough to match Ashley's, the suit was still pulled tight up to your groin, and as such you felt a large amount of discomfort as your genitals were compressed, and then inverted, becoming Ashley's vagina.

After what you had gone through, you were wondering whether you should continue going though with this, but looking down at the top half of the suit in your hands, you figure you might as well finish the job. You put your arms into their proper spots, and feel the same shrinking sensation you had your legs. Still being a young girl, Ashley's chest was still pretty much flat, something you were somewhat glad for. You already had to deal with having a vagina; growing breasts would be something for another time.

Now all that remained was to put the head of the suit on and zip the suit up. Taking the head of the suit in your hands, which you noted were now very small, you pull it over your head and line the features up as best you can, what with Ashley's eyes being much bigger than yours, and her nose being smaller. Once that's done, you reach behind you, and after a little bit of a struggle, you pull the zipper closed. Even though your limbs had shrunken down to Ashley's size, you still felt the suit contracting, becoming tighter, all over your body. You shut your eyes and double over from the pain. And then, almost as quickly as it started, the feeling disappears.

It no longer feels as if you are wearing a suit. Rather, you feel completely naked, and you can feel Ashley's long, black hair flowing down your back. It doesn't look like you're looking through the over-sized eye holes of a mask anymore. Everything felt real. You had really become Ashley, the young witch from the WarioWare series. Pondering your next move, you realised how cold it was in the warehouse, and decided you should get dressed. You take Ashley's clothes off of the shelf next to where the suit had been and begin putting them on. You start with her panties and her tights, before pulling her dress over the top. Your new hair got in the way a bit, so you decide to put it up into two pigtails like Ashley usually did. You complete the look with her tiara, neckerchief, and of course, her shoes. You now looked exactly like Ashley did, both in body and clothes.

12533222222222222222222222222222.title: More Options

125332222222222222222222222222221.content:
As you wander through the aisles of the warehouse, you notice a small section devoted to Nintendo's experimental fighting game, ARMS. You couldn't help but wonder how the suits would mimic the characters' stretchy arms, provided the suits did indeed work like the note claimed. Your curiosity piqued, you approached the rack, deciding to try out the suit of one of the ARMS Fighters.

But which suit did you pick? Did you try on the suit for Ribbon Girl, "The Airess"?
125332222222222222222222222222221.title: ARMS

choices: Fashion Show! Try out some different outfits.
Get dressed as Ribbon Girl, and try out your arms.
1253322222222222222222222222222211.content:
You approached the Ribbon Girl suit hanging on the rack. She had been one of the first characters revealed for the game, and despite more being revealed as development went on, you still liked her the best. It was rather odd to see her skin hanging limply from the rack, though, her clothes hanging next to her. Strangely enough, her ribbon-like arms didn't seem to be as springy as they seemed in game, instead being coiled tightly to resemble normal arms. They also seemed to have normal hands at the end of them, albeit the same pink as the rest of her arms, instead of her usual ARMS, although closer examination revealed her signature ARMS laying nearby, acting as gloves that she could put her hands into.

You were somewhat disappointed that the arms of the suit didn't seem to have the same springy qualities that Ribbon Girl's usually had, but you supposed it would be rather difficult to put your arms into the suit otherwise. Regardless of your disappointment, you decided you might as well try it on, strange as it might be to try on the skin of a young woman. There didn't seem to be anyone else in the warehouse, so you went ahead and just stripped right there, leaving your clothes in a pile next to the rack. It was a bit cold in the warehouse, so you were eager to put something else on, and so you quickly grabbed the Ribbon Girl suit off the rack. It seemed a little short for you, but not so much that it would look too awkward wearing it, although you male body being inside the female suit should make it look awkward enough.

You undo the zipper on the suit's back, and step a leg inside, worming your foot all the way down to the end. It was a bit tight, but since you had already gone this far, you figured you might as well keep going. You step your other leg inside the suit, and pull it up to your waist. Next, you pulled your arms into the arms of the suit, making sure all your fingers were in the right spots. The suit looked a bit stretched out now that you were wearing it, but you kept going regardless. All that was left was the head, which you quickly pulled over your own, matching your facial features up to the suit's. You were now completely inside the suit, and all that was left was to zip it up.

Once you close the zipper, you suddenly feel pain all over your body, as if it were being stretched and squished in ways it wasn't supposed to. Your body shrank down to the height the suit originally was, and your limbs shortened and hands and feet shrank. Your waist crunched inwards, and your calves slimmed. Despite everything else shrinking, your thighs and rear actually inflated to feminine proportions, and your chest bloomed outwards into a pair of breasts. You could feel your facial features rearranging to match Ribbon Girl's, and the suit's crotch flattened out as you could no longer feel your penis, but inside gained feeling in an entirely different private part in its place. As strange as the gender switching felt, though, your arms felt stranger still. Their shape slimmed down to look more feminine, but it felt as if they were hollow, as if you only had feeling on the surface off them, and not the insides.

Just as suddenly as it started, the pain stopped, and you felt the cold of the warehouse again, as if the suit were your own skin. You realised that was because it really was your skin now. The zipper had vanished, although you knew from the note that you should be able to take the suit off whenever you wanted to, so there was no longer anything indicating that this was a suit and not your real skin. It certainly felt very real, regardless. You could even see the nipples on your new breasts stiffening in the cold air.

"...Wow," you mumble, enthralled by what just happened, noticing that your voice now sounded like Ribbon Girl's rather than your own. The suits in the warehouse really did work as advertised, you could really become these characters. Still as much as you were excited about this, you couldn't help but wonder about your arms. The still seemed to be fairly normal despite what they looked like, rather than the springy coils you'd seen in game. You wondered if that was something you needed to activate or something.

You looked back over at the rack where you'd gotten the suit from, feeling Ribbon Girl's ponytail dancing across your back as you did so. You had stepped back a bit while putting the suit on, so it was far enough away that you couldn't simply reach over and get something off the shelf without walking over to it first. Or at least, that would be the case normally. You decided to try and test out whether you really did possess the ARMS ability now that you were Ribbon Girl. You thrust your arm forwards toward the rack, trying to focus on extending all the way towards it. To your surprise, you arm obeys, unraveling its coils until you are able you latch onto something, and then quickly returning with it in hand. Instead of returning to its tightly coiled form, like the other arm currently was in, it instead stayed loose and springy, like it appeared in game. Now that you knew you could extend them easily enough, you tried to deliberately tighten it again, and once again, your arm obeyed, returning to its original form, looking like a female arm with a large ribbon wrapped all around it. You supposed it was a bit more convenient to have normal sized arms from time to time, instead of having them constantly loose and potentially getting caught on things.

You change your focus to the thing you had grabbed off the rack, frowning as you realised what it was. You had been aiming to grab Ribbon Girl's mask, but you had been caught off guard by the sudden extending, and you arm had shot off in another direction, grabbing something else. you instead held in your hand the mask of Twintelle, one of the other characters in ARMS. You were about to put it back, when you suddenly had another thought. You would like to get dressed, if only to protect your new body from the cold air in the warehouse, but who's to say you had to wear Ribbon Girl's outfit just because you had Ribbon Girl's body? The clothes for the other ARMS characters were hanging on the rack too, next to their respective suits, and beyond the rack, the were clothes for all sorts of other fictional girls. You could put on your own little fashion show if you wanted. Still you could put on a fashion show as anyone, but as Ribbon Girl you had the ARMS ability. Why squander that? Maybe you should just get dressed in Ribbon Girl's clothes and then try out your new arms some more.

Alright, so the Seasonal Events, as you saw, are divided into four groups: Christmas, Halloween, Summer, and Valentine's Day. Well, there are a few new characters for certain New Year's events, but most have shown up in the story afterwards, so we'll shove the remaining few into the Christmas section.

Christmas Servants (+some New Year's):

Artoria (Santa Alter), Jeanne Alter (Santa Lily), Altera the San(ta), Ereshkigal, Katsushika Hokusai

Artoria (Archer), Anne Bonny (Archer), Mary Read (Archer), Tamamo-no-Mae (Lancer), Kiyohime (Lancer), Saint Martha (Ruler), Marie Antoinette (Caster), Sir Mordred (Rider), Scathach (Assassin), Ishtar (Rider), Minamoto no Raikou (Lancer), Helena Blavatsky (Archer), Frankenstein's Monster (Saber), Nitocris (Assassin), Oda Nobunaga (Berserker), Nero Claudius (Caster), Artoria (Rider Alter)

1552.content: Hermione, Ginny, or someone unimportant?
1552.title: Harry Potter

15523221.content:
You notice that all the Harry Potter characters -- all female, of course; you haven't seen anything but girl and woman suits in this strange place -- have at least several versions in suit form. There seems to be a Hermione corresponding to the one in every book plus an older one for the epilogue, and the one that really interests you, Fleur Delacour, has at least three versions, all with the superhuman female charm of Fleur's veela ancestry (one grandmother was a veela), but the eldest of them is the sexiest. They're just empty girl suits that look disconcertingly like living but hollow human skins, but they still manage to be wildly alluring.

They don't look quite like the actress who played Fleur, but a cosplayer who looked like a living-girl version of any of them would strike any fan not too slavishly devoted to the movie version as Fleur brought to life.

The power that hot girls have over guys has always struck you as unfair. Now it can be yours to try out for yourself. You undress and choose one of the Fleur Delacour suits to wear. You choose:
15523221.title: Yes, Fleur Delacour

155232211.content:
Maybe this Fleur Delacour suit isn't a wedding day version. Fleur would have been about twenty when she married Bill Weasley despite his injuries, and the empty, alive-looking skin looks a little older. Also it comes with a pretty dress and associated clothes much like what a stylish Frenchwoman of a decade or more ago might wear. There's only one copy of Fleur's nine-and-a-half inch rosewood wand (presumably with a veela-hair core) for all the Fleur suits. You guess that this is a married Fleur from after the defeat of Voldemort but from before her first pregnancy.

The hair of the suit is a strange but stunning silver-blonde that looks completely natural with the suit's pale, almost glowing skin. You can see from the shape of the empty skin that Fleur is a tall woman with elegantly long but slender hands and feet. The suit is one piece, slit from chin to crotch, and you put your left leg into its empty left leg. Your leg slips neatly into place, your wide foot into its narrow one, and in moments your left leg and the suit's have combined into the left leg of Fleur Delacour!

Soon you are entirely Fleur below the waist, your boy parts absorbed into your silver-haired crotch and your hairless legs almost aglow with the look of part-veela girl-skin. Soon you're Fleur up to the neck, and you almost frantically stuff your boy head into the glorious but hollow girl head and seal yourself shut.

Memories new to you flood into your transformed head. A new female personality engulfs your male one. At first it seems as if your Anthony self no longer exists, but soon you're sure that it's intact and definitely in control.

A naked Fleur Delacour gazes contentedly back from the convenient full-length mirror, admiring her tall, slender silver-haired body in an almost matter-of-fact way. A recent memory of hers tells you that now the war is over, she (you, sort of) and Bill have been trying very hard to get her pregnant. Bill's long-healed injuries have been no impediment. You laugh gently and beautifully but your inner Anthony self doesn't feel Fleur's love for or sexual attraction to her husband. Just as well, really.

The woman you've become
155232211.title: the oldest, wedding-day Fleur maybe.
